Gi·∫£i th√≠ch:

  1. Navbar: Ch·ª©a thanh ƒëi·ªÅu h∆∞·ªõng ·ªü ph√≠a tr√™n c·ªßa trang, v·ªõi c√°c li√™n k·∫øt d·∫´n ƒë·∫øn c√°c m·ª•c kh√°c nhau tr√™n trang web.
  2. Ph·∫ßn th√¢n trang (Content): Ch·ª©a c√°c section nh∆∞ "Trang Ch·ªß", "D·ªãch V·ª•", "D·ª± √Ån", v.v., m·ªói m·ª•c ƒë∆∞·ª£c ƒë·ªãnh nghƒ©a v·ªõi c√°c <section>.
  3. Footer: Ph·∫ßn ch√¢n trang v·ªõi th√¥ng tin b·∫£n quy·ªÅn v√† li√™n k·∫øt.

C√°c ph·∫ßn n√†y ƒë√£ ƒë∆∞·ª£c t√°ch bi·ªát r√µ r√†ng, gi√∫p d·ªÖ d√†ng ch·ªânh s·ª≠a v√† m·ªü r·ªông sau n√†y.

B·∫°n ƒë√£ n√≥i:

D∆∞·ªõi ƒë√¢y l√† m√£ HTML v·ªõi d·∫•u g·∫°ch d∆∞·ªõi thay cho d·∫•u g·∫°ch ngang trong ph·∫ßn li√™n k·∫øt trong menu navbar:

d√≤ng code t·∫°o icon cho website

ƒê·ªÉ th√™m bi·ªÉu t∆∞·ª£ng (favicon) cho website, b·∫°n c√≥ th·ªÉ s·ª≠ d·ª•ng m√£ HTML sau trong ph·∫ßn <head> c·ªßa file HTML:

    <link rel="icon" href="path-to-your-icon.ico" type="image/x-icon">

Trong ƒë√≥, href s·∫Ω tr·ªè ƒë·∫øn ƒë∆∞·ªùng d·∫´n c·ªßa file icon (th∆∞·ªùng l√† file .ico, .png ho·∫∑c .jpg). B·∫°n c√≥ th·ªÉ s·ª≠ d·ª•ng c√°c c√¥ng c·ª• nh∆∞ favicon.io ƒë·ªÉ t·∫°o bi·ªÉu t∆∞·ª£ng t·ª´ h√¨nh ·∫£nh.

D∆∞·ªõi ƒë√¢y l√† m·ªôt layout ho√†n ch·ªânh cho trang web "Hanstudio - InfiniteElegance" s·ª≠ d·ª•ng Bootstrap. N√≥ g·ªìm c√°c ph·∫ßn ch√≠nh nh∆∞ Navbar, Hero section, D·ªãch v·ª•, D·ª± √°n, Gi·ªõi thi·ªáu, Blog, Feedback, FAQ, Li√™n h·ªá, Footer.

üåü √ù t∆∞·ªüng thi·∫øt k·∫ø:

  • Tone m√†u: M√†u g·ªó ·∫•m √°p pha tr·ªôn v·ªõi phong c√°ch hi·ªán ƒë·∫°i ‚Üí Be s√°ng (#f5f1e7), X√°m nh·∫π (#d9d9d9), G·ªó tr·∫ßm (#8b5e3b)

  • Phong c√°ch: ƒê∆°n gi·∫£n, tinh t·∫ø, mang n√©t sang tr·ªçng c·ªßa ki·∫øn tr√∫c n·ªôi th·∫•t hi·ªán ƒë·∫°i.

üìå Source Code

html
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="vi">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>Hanstudio - InfiniteElegance</title>
    
    <!-- Bootstrap CSS -->
    <link href="https://stackpath.bootstrapcdn.com/bootstrap/4.3.1/css/bootstrap.min.css" rel="stylesheet">
    <!-- Google Fonts -->
    <link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Playfair+Display:wght@500;700&family=Roboto:wght@300;400;700&display=swap" rel="stylesheet">
    <!-- Custom CSS -->
    <link href="styles.css" rel="stylesheet">
</head>
<body>

    <!-- Navbar -->
    <nav class="navbar navbar-expand-lg navbar-light bg-light">
        <div class="container">
            <a class="navbar-brand" href="#">Hanstudio</a>
            <button class="navbar-toggler" type="button" data-toggle="collapse" data-target="#navbarNav">
                <span class="navbar-toggler-icon"></span>
            </button>
            <div class="collapse navbar-collapse" id="navbarNav">
                <ul class="navbar-nav ml-auto">
                    <li class="nav-item"><a class="nav-link" href="#trang_chu">Trang Ch·ªß</a></li>
                    <li class="nav-item"><a class="nav-link" href="#dich_vu">D·ªãch V·ª•</a></li>
                    <li class="nav-item"><a class="nav-link" href="#du_an">D·ª± √Ån</a></li>
                    <li class="nav-item"><a class="nav-link" href="#gioi_thieu">Gi·ªõi Thi·ªáu</a></li>
                    <li class="nav-item"><a class="nav-link" href="#blog">Blog</a></li>
                    <li class="nav-item"><a class="nav-link" href="#feedback">Feedback</a></li>
                    <li class="nav-item"><a class="nav-link" href="#faq">FAQ</a></li>
                    <li class="nav-item"><a class="nav-link" href="#lien_he">Li√™n H·ªá</a></li>
                </ul>
            </div>
        </div>
    </nav>

    <!-- Hero Section -->
    <header class="hero bg-cover text-center text-white d-flex align-items-center" style="background-image: url('hero-bg.jpg'); height: 80vh;">

ChatGPT ƒë√£ n√≥i:

B·∫°n mu·ªën ki·ªÉm tra Navbar ·ªü kh√≠a c·∫°nh n√†o?

  • Giao di·ªán: M√†u s·∫Øc, font ch·ªØ, k√≠ch th∆∞·ªõc c√≥ h√†i h√≤a v·ªõi t·ªïng th·ªÉ trang web kh√¥ng?
  • Hi·ªáu ·ª©ng: Hover, dropdown, hi·ªáu ·ª©ng cu·ªôn m∆∞·ª£t m√† ch∆∞a?
  • Ch·ª©c nƒÉng: C√°c li√™n k·∫øt c√≥ ho·∫°t ƒë·ªông ƒë√∫ng kh√¥ng? C√≥ c·∫ßn th√™m n√∫t CTA kh√¥ng?
  • Responsive: Hi·ªÉn th·ªã t·ªët tr√™n ƒëi·ªán tho·∫°i, m√°y t√≠nh b·∫£ng ch∆∞a?

üîπ N·∫øu b·∫°n ƒë√£ c√≥ Navbar, h√£y m√¥ t·∫£ ho·∫∑c g·ª≠i code ƒë·ªÉ m√¨nh review chi ti·∫øt nh√©!
üîπ N·∫øu ch∆∞a ho√†n ch·ªânh, m√¨nh c√≥ th·ªÉ gi√∫p b·∫°n ch·ªânh s·ª≠a ho·∫∑c t·ªëi ∆∞u theo y√™u c·∫ßu. üöÄ

B·∫°n ƒë√£ n√≥i:
h√£y t·∫°o code navbar ho√†n ch·ªânh ƒëi
ChatGPT ƒë√£ n√≥i:

D∆∞·ªõi ƒë√¢y l√† code Navbar ho√†n ch·ªânh s·ª≠ d·ª•ng Bootstrap 5, c√≥ ƒë·∫ßy ƒë·ªß t√≠nh nƒÉng:

  • Responsive (t∆∞∆°ng th√≠ch tr√™n m·ªçi thi·∫øt b·ªã)
  • Dropdown menu
  • Hi·ªáu ·ª©ng hover m∆∞·ª£t m√†
  • N√∫t CTA (Li√™n h·ªá)

üìå Code Navbar Hanstudio

html
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="vi">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">
    <title>Hanstudio - Infinite Elegance</title>
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/bootstrap@5.3.2/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css">
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="styles.css">
    <script src="https://kit.fontawesome.com/YOUR-FONT-AWESOME-CODE.js" crossorigin="anonymous"></script>
</head>
<body>

<!-- Navbar -->
<nav class="navbar navbar-expand-lg fixed-top">
    <div class="container">
        <!-- Logo -->
        <a class="navbar-brand" href="index.html">
            <img src="logo.png" alt="Hanstudio Logo" class="logo">
        </a>

        <!-- Toggle button -->
        <button class="navbar-toggler" type="button" data-bs-toggle="collapse" data-bs-target="#navbarNav">
            <span class="navbar-toggler-icon"></span>
        </button>

        <!-- Menu -->
        <div class="collapse navbar-collapse" id="navbarNav">
            <ul class="navbar-nav mx-auto">
                <li class="nav-item"><a class="nav-link active" href="index.html">Trang Ch·ªß</a></li>
                <li class="nav-item"><a class="nav-link" href="about.html">Gi·ªõi Thi·ªáu</a></li>
                <li class="nav-item dropdown">
                    <a class="nav-link dropdown-toggle" href="#" id="servicesDropdown" role="button" data-bs-toggle="dropdown">
                        D·ªãch V·ª•
                    </a>
                    <ul class="dropdown-menu">
                        <li><a class="dropdown-item" href="#">Thi·∫øt K·∫ø N·ªôi Th·∫•t</a></li>
                        <li><a class="dropdown-item" href="#">Thi C√¥ng N·ªôi Th·∫•t</a></li>
                        <li><a class="dropdown-item" href="#">T∆∞ V·∫•n Phong Th·ªßy</a></li>
                    </ul>
                </li>
                <li class="nav-item"><a class="nav-link" href="projects.html">D·ª± √Ån</a></li>
                <li class="nav-item"><a class="nav-link" href="blog.html">Blog</a></li>
                <li class="nav-item"><a class="nav-link" href="faq.html">FAQ</a></li>
                <li class="nav-item"><a class="nav-link" href="feedback.html">Feedback</a></li>
            </ul>

            <!-- N√∫t CTA -->
            <a href="contact.html" class="btn btn-outline-dark btn-cta">Li√™n H·ªá</a>
        </div>
    </div>
</nav>

<script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/bootstrap@5.3.2/dist/js/bootstrap.bundle.min.js"></script>
</body>
</html>

üìå CSS cho Navbar (styles.css)

css
/* C·∫•u h√¨nh chung */
body {
    font-family: 'Roboto', sans-serif;
    margin: 0;
    padding: 0;
}

/* Navbar */
.navbar {
    background-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.9);
    padding: 12px 0;
    transition: all 0.3s ease-in-out;
}

/* Logo */
.logo {
    height: 50px;
}

/* Hi·ªáu ·ª©ng hover */
.navbar-nav .nav-link {
    color: #333;
    font-weight: 500;
    padding: 10px 15px;
    transition: color 0.3s ease-in-out;
}

.navbar-nav .nav-link:hover,
.navbar-nav .nav-link.active {
    color: #8C6239; /* M√†u g·ªó */
}

/* Dropdown */
.dropdown-menu {
    background-color: #fff;
    border: none;
    box-shadow: 0px 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
}

.dropdown-item {
    color: #333;
    transition: background 0.3s;
}

.dropdown-item:hover {
    background-color: #f8f9fa;
}

/* N√∫t CTA */
.btn-cta {
    font-weight: 600;
    padding: 8px 20px;
    border-radius: 30px;
    transition: all 0.3s ease-in-out;
}

.btn-cta:hover {
    background-color: #8C6239;
    color: #fff;
}

üìå ƒêi·ªÉm N·ªïi B·∫≠t

‚úÖ Navbar c·ªë ƒë·ªãnh ·ªü ƒë·∫ßu trang, gi√∫p truy c·∫≠p d·ªÖ d√†ng.
‚úÖ M√†u s·∫Øc h√†i h√≤a, k·∫øt h·ª£p m√†u be, g·ªó, v√† x√°m nh·∫π.
‚úÖ Dropdown menu chuy√™n nghi·ªáp, c√≥ hi·ªáu ·ª©ng hover m∆∞·ª£t.
‚úÖ N√∫t CTA n·ªïi b·∫≠t, d·ªÖ nh√¨n v√† d·ªÖ truy c·∫≠p.
‚úÖ T∆∞∆°ng th√≠ch tr√™n m·ªçi thi·∫øt b·ªã nh·ªù Bootstrap.

üîπ B·∫°n c√≥ c·∫ßn th√™m hi·ªáu ·ª©ng n√¢ng cao kh√¥ng? üöÄ

B·∫°n ƒë√£ n√≥i:
c√≥
ChatGPT ƒë√£ n√≥i:

B·∫°n mu·ªën th√™m hi·ªáu ·ª©ng n√¢ng cao n√†o cho Navbar?
D∆∞·ªõi ƒë√¢y l√† m·ªôt s·ªë g·ª£i √Ω:

1Ô∏è‚É£ Hi·ªáu ·ª©ng ƒë·ªïi m√†u khi cu·ªôn xu·ªëng

üëâ Navbar s·∫Ω c√≥ n·ªÅn trong su·ªët khi ·ªü ƒë·∫ßu trang, nh∆∞ng khi cu·ªôn xu·ªëng, n·ªÅn s·∫Ω ƒë·ªïi m√†u.

2Ô∏è‚É£ Hi·ªáu ·ª©ng underline khi hover v√†o menu

üëâ Khi di chu·ªôt qua menu, s·∫Ω c√≥ m·ªôt g·∫°ch ch√¢n chuy·ªÉn ƒë·ªông m∆∞·ª£t m√†.

3Ô∏è‚É£ Hi·ªáu ·ª©ng dropdown xu·∫•t hi·ªán tr∆∞·ª£t xu·ªëng nh·∫π

üëâ Khi m·ªü menu con, c√°c m·ª•c s·∫Ω xu·∫•t hi·ªán v·ªõi hi·ªáu ·ª©ng fade & slide-down.

üìå B·∫°n mu·ªën th√™m hi·ªáu ·ª©ng n√†o? Ho·∫∑c c√≥ y√™u c·∫ßu kh√°c? üöÄ

B·∫°n ƒë√£ n√≥i:
t·∫•t c·∫£ ƒëi
ChatGPT ƒë√£ n√≥i:

D∆∞·ªõi ƒë√¢y l√† Navbar ho√†n ch·ªânh, bao g·ªìm t·∫•t c·∫£ c√°c hi·ªáu ·ª©ng n√¢ng cao:

‚úÖ Hi·ªáu ·ª©ng ƒë·ªïi m√†u khi cu·ªôn (transparent ‚Üí m√†u n·ªÅn khi cu·ªôn xu·ªëng)
‚úÖ Hi·ªáu ·ª©ng underline khi hover
‚úÖ Hi·ªáu ·ª©ng dropdown xu·∫•t hi·ªán tr∆∞·ª£t xu·ªëng nh·∫π

üìå C·∫≠p nh·∫≠t Code Navbar (HTML)

html
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="vi">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">
    <title>Hanstudio - Infinite Elegance</title>
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/bootstrap@5.3.2/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css">
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="styles.css">
    <script src="https://kit.fontawesome.com/YOUR-FONT-AWESOME-CODE.js" crossorigin="anonymous"></script>
</head>
<body>

<!-- Navbar -->
<nav class="navbar navbar-expand-lg fixed-top">
    <div class="container">
        <!-- Logo -->
        <a class="navbar-brand" href="index.html">
            <img src="logo.png" alt="Hanstudio Logo" class="logo">
        </a>

        <!-- Toggle button -->
        <button class="navbar-toggler" type="button" data-bs-toggle="collapse" data-bs-target="#navbarNav">
            <span class="navbar-toggler-icon"></span>
        </button>

        <!-- Menu -->
        <div class="collapse navbar-collapse" id="navbarNav">
            <ul class="navbar-nav mx-auto">
                <li class="nav-item"><a class="nav-link active" href="index.html">Trang Ch·ªß</a></li>
                <li class="nav-item"><a class="nav-link" href="about.html">Gi·ªõi Thi·ªáu</a></li>
                <li class="nav-item dropdown">
                    <a class="nav-link dropdown-toggle" href="#" id="servicesDropdown" role="button" data-bs-toggle="dropdown">
                        D·ªãch V·ª•
                    </a>
                    <ul class="dropdown-menu">
                        <li><a class="dropdown-item" href="#">Thi·∫øt K·∫ø N·ªôi Th·∫•t</a></li>
                        <li><a class="dropdown-item" href="#">Thi C√¥ng N·ªôi Th·∫•t</a></li>
                        <li><a class="dropdown-item" href="#">T∆∞ V·∫•n Phong Th·ªßy</a></li>
                    </ul>
                </li>
                <li class="nav-item"><a class="nav-link" href="projects.html">D·ª± √Ån</a></li>
                <li class="nav-item"><a class="nav-link" href="blog.html">Blog</a></li>
                <li class="nav-item"><a class="nav-link" href="faq.html">FAQ</a></li>
                <li class="nav-item"><a class="nav-link" href="feedback.html">Feedback</a></li>
            </ul>

            <!-- N√∫t CTA -->
            <a href="contact.html" class="btn btn-outline-dark btn-cta">Li√™n H·ªá</a>
        </div>
    </div>
</nav>

<script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/bootstrap@5.3.2/dist/js/bootstrap.bundle.min.js"></script>
<script src="script.js"></script>
</body>
</html>

üìå C·∫≠p nh·∫≠t CSS (styles.css)

css
/* C·∫•u h√¨nh chung */
body {
    font-family: 'Roboto', sans-serif;
    margin: 0;
    padding: 0;
}

/* Navbar m·∫∑c ƒë·ªãnh */
.navbar {
    background-color: transparent;
    padding: 12px 0;
    transition: all 0.3s ease-in-out;
}

/* Navbar khi cu·ªôn */
.navbar.scrolled {
    background-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.95);
    box-shadow: 0 4px 6px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
}

/* Logo */
.logo {
    height: 50px;
}

/* Hi·ªáu ·ª©ng hover v·ªõi underline */
.navbar-nav .nav-link {
    color: #333;
    font-weight: 500;
    padding: 10px 15px;
    position: relative;
    transition: color 0.3s ease-in-out;
}

.navbar-nav .nav-link::after {
    content: "";
    position: absolute;
    left: 0;
    bottom: 5px;
    width: 100%;
    height: 2px;
    background-color: #8C6239; /* M√†u g·ªó */
    transform: scaleX(0);
    transition: transform 0.3s ease-in-out;
}

.navbar-nav .nav-link:hover::after,
.navbar-nav .nav-link.active::after {
    transform: scaleX(1);
}

/* Dropdown menu */
.dropdown-menu {
    background-color: #fff;
    border: none;
    box-shadow: 0px 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
    opacity: 0;
    visibility: hidden;
    transform: translateY(10px);
    transition: opacity 0.3s ease, transform 0.3s ease;
}

.dropdown:hover .dropdown-menu {
    opacity: 1;
    visibility: visible;
    transform: translateY(0);
}

.dropdown-item {
    color: #333;
    transition: background 0.3s;
}

.dropdown-item:hover {
    background-color: #f8f9fa;
}

/* N√∫t CTA */
.btn-cta {
    font-weight: 600;
    padding: 8px 20px;
    border-radius: 30px;
    transition: all 0.3s ease-in-out;
}

.btn-cta:hover {
    background-color: #8C6239;
    color: #fff;
}

üìå JavaScript (script.js)

js
// Hi·ªáu ·ª©ng ƒë·ªïi m√†u Navbar khi cu·ªôn
window.addEventListener("scroll", function() {
    let navbar = document.querySelector(".navbar");
    if (window.scrollY > 50) {
        navbar.classList.add("scrolled");
    } else {
        navbar.classList.remove("scrolled");
    }
});

üìå Hi·ªáu ·ª©ng ƒë√£ th√™m:

‚úÖ Hi·ªáu ·ª©ng ƒë·ªïi m√†u Navbar khi cu·ªôn (trong su·ªët ‚Üí n·ªÅn tr·∫Øng, th√™m b√≥ng nh·∫π)
‚úÖ Hi·ªáu ·ª©ng underline khi hover v√†o menu
‚úÖ Hi·ªáu ·ª©ng dropdown tr∆∞·ª£t xu·ªëng nh·∫π
‚úÖ T·ªëi ∆∞u cho mobile

üöÄ B·∫°n c·∫ßn th√™m g√¨ n·ªØa kh√¥ng?

B·∫°n ƒë√£ n√≥i:
gi·∫£i th√≠ch cho t√¥i t·ª´ng thu·ªôc t√≠nh c√¢u l·ªánh c·ªët l√µi c·ªßa ƒëo·∫°n code tr√™n
ChatGPT ƒë√£ n√≥i:

Gi·∫£i th√≠ch t·ª´ng thu·ªôc t√≠nh c·ªët l√µi c·ªßa Navbar Bootstrap & hi·ªáu ·ª©ng

D∆∞·ªõi ƒë√¢y l√† ph·∫ßn ph√¢n t√≠ch t·ª´ng d√≤ng quan tr·ªçng trong HTML, CSS, v√† JavaScript c·ªßa Navbar.

1Ô∏è‚É£ Ph√¢n t√≠ch HTML

üìå C·∫•u tr√∫c ch√≠nh c·ªßa Navbar

html
<nav class="navbar navbar-expand-lg fixed-top">
  • navbar: L√† class c·ªßa Bootstrap ƒë·ªÉ t·∫°o thanh ƒëi·ªÅu h∆∞·ªõng (Navigation Bar).
  • navbar-expand-lg: L√†m cho Navbar m·ªü r·ªông ƒë·∫ßy ƒë·ªß tr√™n m√†n h√¨nh l·ªõn (‚â•992px) nh∆∞ng thu g·ªçn th√†nh menu tr√™n m√†n h√¨nh nh·ªè.
  • fixed-top: Gi·ªØ Navbar c·ªë ƒë·ªãnh ·ªü ƒë·∫ßu trang ngay c·∫£ khi cu·ªôn xu·ªëng.

üìå N√∫t Toggle (khi thu g·ªçn tr√™n mobile)

html
<button class="navbar-toggler" type="button" data-bs-toggle="collapse" data-bs-target="#navbarNav">
    <span class="navbar-toggler-icon"></span>
</button>
  • navbar-toggler: ƒê√¢y l√† n√∫t b·∫•m hi·ªÉn th·ªã khi m√†n h√¨nh nh·ªè.
  • data-bs-toggle="collapse": Khi nh·∫•n, n√≥ s·∫Ω thu g·ªçn ho·∫∑c m·ªü r·ªông menu.
  • data-bs-target="#navbarNav": Ch·ªâ ƒë·ªãnh menu n√†o s·∫Ω b·ªã ·∫£nh h∆∞·ªüng khi b·∫•m n√∫t.

üìå Dropdown Menu (Menu th·∫£ xu·ªëng)

html
<li class="nav-item dropdown">
    <a class="nav-link dropdown-toggle" href="#" id="servicesDropdown" role="button" data-bs-toggle="dropdown">
        D·ªãch V·ª•
    </a>
    <ul class="dropdown-menu">
        <li><a class="dropdown-item" href="#">Thi·∫øt K·∫ø N·ªôi Th·∫•t</a></li>
        <li><a class="dropdown-item" href="#">Thi C√¥ng N·ªôi Th·∫•t</a></li>
    </ul>
</li>
  • dropdown: T·∫°o menu con c√≥ th·ªÉ th·∫£ xu·ªëng.
  • dropdown-toggle: T·∫°o hi·ªáu ·ª©ng dropdown khi b·∫•m v√†o.
  • data-bs-toggle="dropdown": Bootstrap s·∫Ω t·ª± ƒë·ªông m·ªü menu khi b·∫•m v√†o.
  • dropdown-menu: Danh s√°ch c√°c m·ª•c trong menu th·∫£ xu·ªëng.

üìå N√∫t CTA "Li√™n H·ªá"

html
<a href="contact.html" class="btn btn-outline-dark btn-cta">Li√™n H·ªá</a>
  • btn btn-outline-dark: Bootstrap class ƒë·ªÉ t·∫°o n√∫t vi·ªÅn m√†u ƒëen.
  • btn-cta: Class t√πy ch·ªânh ƒë·ªÉ th√™m hi·ªáu ·ª©ng ri√™ng.

2Ô∏è‚É£ Ph√¢n t√≠ch CSS

üìå Hi·ªáu ·ª©ng ƒë·ªïi m√†u khi cu·ªôn Navbar

css
.navbar {
    background-color: transparent;
    padding: 12px 0;
    transition: all 0.3s ease-in-out;
}

.navbar.scrolled {
    background-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.95);
    box-shadow: 0 4px 6px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
}
  • background-color: transparent; ‚Üí L√∫c ƒë·∫ßu, Navbar trong su·ªët.
  • .navbar.scrolled ‚Üí Khi cu·ªôn xu·ªëng, ƒë·ªïi n·ªÅn sang tr·∫Øng m·ªù (rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.95)).
  • box-shadow: 0 4px 6px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1); ‚Üí T·∫°o b√≥ng nh·∫π cho Navbar khi cu·ªôn xu·ªëng.
  • transition: all 0.3s ease-in-out; ‚Üí L√†m hi·ªáu ·ª©ng chuy·ªÉn ƒë·ªïi m∆∞·ª£t m√† trong 0.3 gi√¢y.

üìå Hi·ªáu ·ª©ng underline khi hover v√†o menu

css
.navbar-nav .nav-link {
    color: #333;
    font-weight: 500;
    padding: 10px 15px;
    position: relative;
    transition: color 0.3s ease-in-out;
}

.navbar-nav .nav-link::after {
    content: "";
    position: absolute;
    left: 0;
    bottom: 5px;
    width: 100%;
    height: 2px;
    background-color: #8C6239;
    transform: scaleX(0);
    transition: transform 0.3s ease-in-out;
}

.navbar-nav .nav-link:hover::after,
.navbar-nav .nav-link.active::after {
    transform: scaleX(1);
}
  • ::after ‚Üí Th√™m m·ªôt ƒë∆∞·ªùng g·∫°ch ch√¢n ·∫£o b√™n d∆∞·ªõi m·ªói m·ª•c menu.
  • transform: scaleX(0); ‚Üí L√∫c ƒë·∫ßu g·∫°ch ch√¢n c√≥ chi·ªÅu r·ªông 0 (·∫©n ƒëi).
  • transform: scaleX(1); ‚Üí Khi hover, n√≥ m·ªü r·ªông ra to√†n b·ªô chi·ªÅu d√†i.

üìå Dropdown tr∆∞·ª£t xu·ªëng nh·∫π

css
.dropdown-menu {
    background-color: #fff;
    border: none;
    box-shadow: 0px 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
    opacity: 0;
    visibility: hidden;
    transform: translateY(10px);
    transition: opacity 0.3s ease, transform 0.3s ease;
}

.dropdown:hover .dropdown-menu {
    opacity: 1;
    visibility: visible;
    transform: translateY(0);
}
  • opacity: 0; visibility: hidden; ‚Üí L√∫c ƒë·∫ßu menu b·ªã ·∫©n.
  • transform: translateY(10px); ‚Üí Ban ƒë·∫ßu menu h∆°i l·ªách xu·ªëng.
  • Khi hover:
    • opacity: 1; visibility: visible; ‚Üí Hi·ªÉn th·ªã menu.
    • transform: translateY(0); ‚Üí Tr·ªü v·ªÅ v·ªã tr√≠ ban ƒë·∫ßu (hi·ªáu ·ª©ng tr∆∞·ª£t l√™n nh·∫π).

3Ô∏è‚É£ Ph√¢n t√≠ch JavaScript

üìå Th√™m class "scrolled" khi cu·ªôn trang

js
window.addEventListener("scroll", function() {
    let navbar = document.querySelector(".navbar");
    if (window.scrollY > 50) {
        navbar.classList.add("scrolled");
    } else {
        navbar.classList.remove("scrolled");
    }
});
  • window.addEventListener("scroll", function() {...}) ‚Üí Theo d√µi s·ª± ki·ªán cu·ªôn trang.
  • window.scrollY > 50 ‚Üí Khi cu·ªôn xu·ªëng h∆°n 50px, Navbar thay ƒë·ªïi m√†u.
  • navbar.classList.add("scrolled") ‚Üí Th√™m class "scrolled" v√†o Navbar.
  • navbar.classList.remove("scrolled") ‚Üí Khi cu·ªôn l√™n l·∫°i, b·ªè class "scrolled".

üîé T·ªïng k·∫øt c√°c hi·ªáu ·ª©ng quan tr·ªçng

Hi·ªáu ·ª©ngC√¥ng ngh·ªáC√°ch ho·∫°t ƒë·ªông
Navbar ƒë·ªïi m√†u khi cu·ªônJavaScript + CSSKhi cu·ªôn > 50px, th√™m class .scrolled ƒë·ªÉ ƒë·ªïi m√†u n·ªÅn.
Underline khi hover v√†o menuCSS::after t·∫°o ƒë∆∞·ªùng underline, d√πng scaleX() ƒë·ªÉ hi·ªÉn th·ªã m∆∞·ª£t m√†.
Dropdown tr∆∞·ª£t xu·ªëng nh·∫πCSSopacity + visibility + transform ƒë·ªÉ t·∫°o hi·ªáu ·ª©ng m∆∞·ª£t.

üìå B·∫°n c√≥ mu·ªën b·ªï sung hi·ªáu ·ª©ng n√†o kh√°c kh√¥ng? üöÄ

B·∫°n ƒë√£ n√≥i:
t√¥i nghƒ© khi nh·∫•p v√†o c√°c m·ª•c trong menu th√¨ s·∫Ω link ƒë·∫øn v·ªã tr√≠ c·ªßa c√°c m·ª•c ƒë√≥ nh∆∞ng b·∫°n l√†m tr·ªè th·∫≥ng n√≥ ƒë·∫øn m·ªôt trang kh√°c th·∫ø c√≤n giao di·ªán c·ªßa landingpage th√¨ sao
ChatGPT ƒë√£ n√≥i:

B·∫°n ƒëang mu·ªën Navbar c√≥ ch·ª©c nƒÉng cu·ªôn ƒë·∫øn v·ªã tr√≠ t∆∞∆°ng ·ª©ng tr√™n c√πng m·ªôt trang thay v√¨ chuy·ªÉn sang trang m·ªõi? ƒêi·ªÅu n√†y c√≥ th·ªÉ th·ª±c hi·ªán b·∫±ng c√°ch s·ª≠ d·ª•ng Anchor Links (id trong HTML) k·∫øt h·ª£p v·ªõi Hi·ªáu ·ª©ng cu·ªôn m∆∞·ª£t b·∫±ng JavaScript.

üî• C√°ch tri·ªÉn khai Navbar cu·ªôn m∆∞·ª£t ƒë·∫øn m·ª•c tr√™n trang (One-page Navigation)

1Ô∏è‚É£ C·∫≠p nh·∫≠t HTML: Th√™m ID cho t·ª´ng m·ª•c

Thay v√¨ d√πng href="services.html", ch√∫ng ta d√πng href="#services" ƒë·ªÉ li√™n k·∫øt ƒë·∫øn m·ªôt v·ªã tr√≠ c·ª• th·ªÉ tr√™n trang.

html

    <div class="container">
        <a class="navbar-brand" href="#">Hanstudio</a>
        <button class="navbar-toggler" type="button" data-bs-toggle="collapse" data-bs-target="#navbarNav">
            <span class="navbar-toggler-icon"></span>
        </button>
        <div class="collapse navbar-collapse" id="navbarNav">
            <ul class="navbar-nav ms-auto">
                <li class="nav-item"><a class="nav-link" href="#home">Trang Ch·ªß</a></li>
                <li class="nav-item"><a class="nav-link" href="#services">D·ªãch V·ª•</a></li>
                <li class="nav-item"><a class="nav-link" href="#projects">D·ª± √Ån</a></li>
                <li class="nav-item"><a class="nav-link" href="#about">Gi·ªõi Thi·ªáu</a></li>

‚úÖ ƒêi·ªÉm ch√≠nh: M·ªói href tr·ªè ƒë·∫øn m·ªôt id c·ªßa ph·∫ßn t∆∞∆°ng ·ª©ng tr√™n trang.

2Ô∏è‚É£ Th√™m c√°c section t∆∞∆°ng ·ª©ng v√†o Landing Page

Ch√∫ng ta c·∫ßn th√™m ID v√†o c√°c ph·∫ßn tr√™n trang ƒë·ªÉ khi click v√†o menu, tr√¨nh duy·ªát cu·ªôn ƒë·∫øn ƒë√∫ng v·ªã tr√≠.

    <h1>Ch√†o m·ª´ng ƒë·∫øn v·ªõi Hanstudio</h1>

‚úÖ M·ªói ph·∫ßn ƒë·ªÅu c√≥ m·ªôt id ƒë·ªÉ khi nh·∫•p v√†o menu, n√≥ cu·ªôn ƒë√∫ng ƒë·∫øn ph·∫ßn ƒë√≥.

3Ô∏è‚É£ Th√™m hi·ªáu ·ª©ng cu·ªôn m∆∞·ª£t b·∫±ng CSS

M·∫∑c ƒë·ªãnh, khi b·∫•m v√†o li√™n k·∫øt #id, tr√¨nh duy·ªát s·∫Ω nh·∫£y ngay l·∫≠p t·ª©c ƒë·∫øn v·ªã tr√≠ ƒë√≥. ƒê·ªÉ c√≥ hi·ªáu ·ª©ng cu·ªôn m∆∞·ª£t h∆°n, ta th√™m CSS:

css
html {
    scroll-behavior: smooth;
}

‚úÖ Hi·ªáu ·ª©ng cu·ªôn m∆∞·ª£t ƒë∆∞·ª£c √°p d·ª•ng t·ª± ƒë·ªông khi b·∫•m v√†o Navbar.

4Ô∏è‚É£ Th√™m hi·ªáu ·ª©ng ƒë√°nh d·∫•u menu ƒëang active

Ch√∫ng ta c√≥ th·ªÉ s·ª≠ d·ª•ng JavaScript ƒë·ªÉ l√†m n·ªïi b·∫≠t m·ª•c menu n√†o ƒëang active khi cu·ªôn trang.

js
document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function () {
    let sections = document.querySelectorAll("section");
    let navLinks = document.querySelectorAll(".nav-link");

    window.addEventListener("scroll", function () {
        let current = "";

        sections.forEach((section) => {
            let sectionTop = section.offsetTop;
            let sectionHeight = section.clientHeight;
            if (pageYOffset >= sectionTop - 50) {
                current = section.getAttribute("id");
            }
        });

        navLinks.forEach((link) => {
            link.classList.remove("active");
            if (link.getAttribute("href") === `#${current}`) {
                link.classList.add("active");
            }
        });
    });
});

‚úÖ Khi cu·ªôn trang, m·ª•c menu t∆∞∆°ng ·ª©ng s·∫Ω ƒë∆∞·ª£c highlight t·ª± ƒë·ªông.

üìå T√≥m t·∫Øt

‚úî C·∫≠p nh·∫≠t Navbar: D√πng href="#id" thay v√¨ href="page.html".
‚úî Th√™m id cho m·ªói m·ª•c: ƒê·ªÉ c√≥ th·ªÉ cu·ªôn ƒë·∫øn ƒë√∫ng v·ªã tr√≠.
‚úî CSS scroll-behavior: smooth;: T·∫°o hi·ªáu ·ª©ng cu·ªôn m∆∞·ª£t.
‚úî JavaScript highlight menu ƒëang active: Khi cu·ªôn trang, menu t∆∞∆°ng ·ª©ng s√°ng l√™n.

üîπ B·∫°n c√≥ mu·ªën th√™m hi·ªáu ·ª©ng n√†o kh√°c kh√¥ng? üöÄ

B·∫°n ƒë√£ n√≥i:

üîç L·ªói c·∫ßn ch·ªânh s·ª≠a trong code Navbar

B·∫°n c√≥ m·ªôt s·ªë l·ªói v·ªÅ c·∫•u tr√∫c HTML trong code Navbar n√†y:

  1. L·ªói ƒë√≥ng th·∫ª <a> sai c√°ch

    • Trong c√°c m·ª•c <li>, n·ªôi dung vƒÉn b·∫£n (v√≠ d·ª•: "Trang Ch·ªß") ph·∫£i n·∫±m b√™n trong th·∫ª <a>, kh√¥ng ph·∫£i b√™n ngo√†i.
    • ƒê√∫ng: <a href="#home" class="nav-link">Trang Ch·ªß</a>

  2. L·ªói th·∫ª <li class="faq">

    • Th·∫ª <li> c·ªßa FAQ c√≥ ch·ª©a m·ªôt ƒëo·∫°n <p>, nh∆∞ng th·∫ª <a> b√™n trong b·ªã vi·∫øt sai c√∫ ph√°p.

  3. Th·∫ª <li> c·ªßa n√∫t "Li√™n H·ªá" ƒëang d√πng btn nh∆∞ng vi·∫øt sai c√°ch

    • Hi·ªán t·∫°i, <a> b·ªã ƒë√≥ng th·∫ª ngay l·∫≠p t·ª©c (<a href="#contact" class="btn btn-outline-dark btn-cta"></a>Li√™n H·ªá).
    • C·∫ßn ƒë∆∞a ch·ªØ "Li√™n H·ªá" v√†o b√™n trong th·∫ª <a>.

üîß C√°c s·ª≠a l·ªói v√† c·∫£i ti·∫øn

‚úÖ Lo·∫°i b·ªè <li class="faq"> kh√¥ng ƒë√∫ng chu·∫©n: Thay b·∫±ng <li class="nav-item"> nh∆∞ c√°c m·ª•c kh√°c.
‚úÖ T·ªëi ∆∞u HTML cho "Li√™n H·ªá": ƒê∆∞a ch·ªØ "Li√™n H·ªá" v√†o trong th·∫ª <a>.

üìå B·∫°n c√≥ mu·ªën th√™m hi·ªáu ·ª©ng n√†o kh√°c cho Navbar kh√¥ng? üöÄ

Logo b·ªã l·ªõn c√≥ th·ªÉ do k√≠ch th∆∞·ªõc ·∫£nh g·ªëc qu√° l·ªõn ho·∫∑c do CSS ch∆∞a gi·ªõi h·∫°n chi·ªÅu r·ªông v√† chi·ªÅu cao h·ª£p l√Ω. ƒê·ªÉ kh·∫Øc ph·ª•c, b·∫°n c√≥ th·ªÉ gi·ªõi h·∫°n k√≠ch th∆∞·ªõc logo b·∫±ng CSS nh∆∞ sau:

üõ† C√°ch kh·∫Øc ph·ª•c k√≠ch th∆∞·ªõc logo b·ªã l·ªõn

Th√™m ƒëo·∫°n CSS sau v√†o file style.css c·ªßa b·∫°n:

css

    height: 50px; /* ƒêi·ªÅu ch·ªânh chi·ªÅu cao mong mu·ªën */
    width: auto; /* Gi·ªØ t·ª∑ l·ªá khung h√¨nh */
    max-width: 150px; /* ƒê·∫£m b·∫£o logo kh√¥ng qu√° l·ªõn */
}

Ho·∫∑c n·∫øu b·∫°n mu·ªën logo t·ª± ƒëi·ªÅu ch·ªânh k√≠ch th∆∞·ªõc theo navbar:

css

    max-height: 60px; /* Gi·ªØ cho logo kh√¥ng qu√° l·ªõn */
    width: auto; /* Gi·ªØ t·ª∑ l·ªá */

üìå Gi·∫£i th√≠ch

‚úÖ height: 50px; ‚Üí Gi·ªõi h·∫°n chi·ªÅu cao logo ƒë·ªÉ kh√¥ng b·ªã qu√° l·ªõn.
‚úÖ width: auto; ‚Üí Gi·ªØ nguy√™n t·ª∑ l·ªá g·ªëc c·ªßa h√¨nh ·∫£nh.
‚úÖ max-width: 150px; ‚Üí ƒê·∫£m b·∫£o logo kh√¥ng v∆∞·ª£t qu√° k√≠ch th∆∞·ªõc t·ªëi ƒëa.

N·∫øu v·∫´n ch∆∞a ·ªïn, b·∫°n c√≥ th·ªÉ th·ª≠ ƒëi·ªÅu ch·ªânh gi√° tr·ªã height ho·∫∑c max-width theo mong mu·ªën. B·∫°n mu·ªën logo nh·ªè h∆°n hay l·ªõn h∆°n m·ªôt ch√∫t? üöÄ

B·∫°n ƒë√£ n√≥i:
t·ªïng h·ª£p l·∫°i code navbar theo y√™u c·∫ßu
ChatGPT ƒë√£ n√≥i:

D∆∞·ªõi ƒë√¢y l√† code Navbar ho√†n ch·ªânh ƒë√£ t·ªëi ∆∞u theo y√™u c·∫ßu c·ªßa b·∫°n, bao g·ªìm:
‚úÖ Menu c√≥ hi·ªáu ·ª©ng cu·ªôn ƒë·∫øn c√°c ph·∫ßn tr√™n Landing Page
‚úÖ Logo c√≥ k√≠ch th∆∞·ªõc h·ª£p l√Ω, kh√¥ng qu√° l·ªõn
‚úÖ N√∫t "Li√™n H·ªá" n·ªïi b·∫≠t v·ªõi Bootstrap Button
‚úÖ Responsive (t∆∞∆°ng th√≠ch v·ªõi c·∫£ mobile v√† desktop)

üîπ Code Navbar Ho√†n Ch·ªânh

html
<!-- Navbar -->
<nav class="navbar navbar-expand-lg fixed-top">
  <div class="container">
    <!-- Logo -->
    <a href="#home" class="navbar-brand">
      <img src="img/favicon/logo_icon_Hanstudio.jpg" alt="Hanstudio Logo" class="logo">
    </a>

    <!-- Toggle Button (Mobile) -->
    <button class="navbar-toggler" type="button" data-bs-toggle="collapse" data-bs-target="#navbarNav">
      <span class="navbar-toggler-icon"></span>
    </button>

    <!-- Navbar Items -->
    <div class="collapse navbar-collapse" id="navbarNav">
      <ul class="navbar-nav ms-auto">
        <li class="nav-item">
          <a href="#home" class="nav-link">Trang Ch·ªß</a>
        </li>
        <li class="nav-item">
          <a href="#services" class="nav-link">D·ªãch V·ª•</a>
        </li>
        <li class="nav-item">
          <a href="#projects" class="nav-link">D·ª± √Ån</a>
        </li>
        <li class="nav-item">
          <a href="#about" class="nav-link">Gi·ªõi Thi·ªáu</a>
        </li>
        <li class="nav-item">
          <a href="#blog" class="nav-link">Blog</a>
        </li>
        <li class="nav-item">
          <a href="#feedback" class="nav-link">Feedback</a>

        <li class="nav-item">

        </li>
        <li class="nav-item">
          <a href="#contact" class="btn btn-outline-dark btn-cta">Li√™n H·ªá</a>
        </li>
      </ul>
    </div>
  </div>
</nav>

üé® CSS (style.css)

Th√™m CSS n√†y ƒë·ªÉ cƒÉn ch·ªânh logo v√† t·ªëi ∆∞u giao di·ªán:

css
/* Gi·ªõi h·∫°n k√≠ch th∆∞·ªõc logo */
.logo {
    height: 50px; /* ƒêi·ªÅu ch·ªânh chi·ªÅu cao mong mu·ªën */
    width: auto; /* Gi·ªØ t·ª∑ l·ªá khung h√¨nh */
    max-width: 150px; /* ƒê·∫£m b·∫£o logo kh√¥ng qu√° l·ªõn */
}

/* Navbar Styling */
.navbar {
    background: #ffffff; /* N·ªÅn tr·∫Øng tinh t·∫ø */
    padding: 10px 20px;
    box-shadow: 0 4px 6px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1); /* Hi·ªáu ·ª©ng ƒë·ªï b√≥ng nh·∫π */
}

/* ƒêi·ªÅu ch·ªânh menu */
.navbar-nav .nav-link {
    font-family: "Playfair Display", serif; /* Font sang tr·ªçng */
    color: #333333; /* M√†u ch·ªØ x√°m ƒë·∫≠m */
    padding: 10px 15px;
    transition: color 0.3s ease-in-out;
}

/* Hover effect */
.navbar-nav .nav-link:hover {
    color: #556b2f; /* M√†u xanh r√™u nh·∫°t */
}

/* N√∫t Li√™n H·ªá */
.btn-cta {
    border-radius: 20px;
    border: 2px solid #556b2f;
    color: #556b2f;
    transition: all 0.3s ease-in-out;
}

.btn-cta:hover {
    background: #556b2f;
    color: white;
}

üìå ƒêi·ªÉm N·ªïi B·∫≠t

‚úÖ Menu tr·ªè ƒë·∫øn t·ª´ng ph·∫ßn tr√™n Landing Page (#home, #services,...)
‚úÖ Logo k√≠ch th∆∞·ªõc h·ª£p l√Ω, kh√¥ng qu√° l·ªõn
‚úÖ Hi·ªáu ·ª©ng hover m∆∞·ª£t m√† khi di chu·ªôt v√†o menu
‚úÖ N√∫t "Li√™n H·ªá" n·ªïi b·∫≠t v·ªõi bo tr√≤n v√† hi·ªáu ·ª©ng m√†u xanh r√™u nh·∫°t
‚úÖ T∆∞∆°ng th√≠ch mobile v√† PC (Bootstrap h·ªó tr·ª£ Responsive)

B·∫°n mu·ªën th√™m hi·ªáu ·ª©ng n√†o n·ªØa kh√¥ng? üöÄ

B·∫°n ƒë√£ n√≥i:
<!-- Toggle Button (Mobile) --> <button class="navbar-toggler" type="button" data-bs-toggle="collapse" data-bs-target="#navbarNav"> <span class="navbar-toggler-icon"></span> </button>
ChatGPT ƒë√£ n√≥i:

Gi·∫£i th√≠ch ƒëo·∫°n code Toggle Button (Mobile)

ƒê√¢y l√† n√∫t m·ªü r·ªông menu khi s·ª≠ d·ª•ng tr√™n m√†n h√¨nh nh·ªè (mobile). Khi nh·∫•n v√†o, menu s·∫Ω m·ªü ra ho·∫∑c thu g·ªçn l·∫°i.

üìå Ph√¢n t√≠ch t·ª´ng ph·∫ßn

html
<button class="navbar-toggler" type="button" data-bs-toggle="collapse" data-bs-target="#navbarNav">
  <span class="navbar-toggler-icon"></span>
</button>

  1. <button class="navbar-toggler">

    • ƒê√¢y l√† m·ªôt n√∫t b·∫•m (button) ƒë∆∞·ª£c Bootstrap s·ª≠ d·ª•ng ƒë·ªÉ m·ªü r·ªông ho·∫∑c thu g·ªçn menu khi ·ªü ch·∫ø ƒë·ªô mobile.
    • class="navbar-toggler" ‚Üí Bootstrap nh·∫≠n di·ªán ƒë√¢y l√† n√∫t m·ªü r·ªông menu.

  2. type="button"

    • X√°c ƒë·ªãnh lo·∫°i c·ªßa <button>, trong tr∆∞·ªùng h·ª£p n√†y l√† button th√¥ng th∆∞·ªùng (kh√¥ng ph·∫£i submit form).

  3. data-bs-toggle="collapse"

    • K√≠ch ho·∫°t ch·ª©c nƒÉng thu g·ªçn (collapse) c·ªßa Bootstrap khi n√∫t ƒë∆∞·ª£c nh·∫•n.

  4. data-bs-target="#navbarNav"

    • X√°c ƒë·ªãnh ph·∫ßn t·ª≠ s·∫Ω b·ªã thu g·ªçn/m·ªü r·ªông khi nh·∫•n v√†o n√∫t.
    • ·ªû ƒë√¢y, #navbarNav l√† ID c·ªßa menu c·∫ßn ƒëi·ªÅu khi·ªÉn, c·ª• th·ªÉ:
      html
      <div class="collapse navbar-collapse" id="navbarNav">
      • Khi nh·∫•n v√†o n√∫t Toggle Button, ph·∫ßn menu <div id="navbarNav"> s·∫Ω hi·ªÉn th·ªã ho·∫∑c ·∫©n ƒëi.

  5. <span class="navbar-toggler-icon"></span>

    • Ch·ª©a bi·ªÉu t∆∞·ª£ng 3 g·∫°ch ngang (hamburger menu) do Bootstrap t·∫°o s·∫µn.
    • ƒê√¢y l√† bi·ªÉu t∆∞·ª£ng m·∫∑c ƒë·ªãnh c·ªßa Bootstrap, c√≥ th·ªÉ t√πy ch·ªânh b·∫±ng CSS.

üé® T√πy ch·ªânh Toggle Button b·∫±ng CSS

N·∫øu b·∫°n mu·ªën thay ƒë·ªïi m√†u s·∫Øc ho·∫∑c k√≠ch th∆∞·ªõc, h√£y th√™m CSS nh∆∞ sau:

    border: none; /* Lo·∫°i b·ªè vi·ªÅn */
    outline: none;

    background-color: #556b2f; /* M√†u xanh r√™u nh·∫°t */
    border-radius: 5px;
    width: 30px;
    height: 3px;

üìå K·∫øt qu·∫£

üì± Tr√™n mobile: Khi nh·∫•n v√†o n√∫t toggle, menu s·∫Ω m·ªü ra ho·∫∑c thu g·ªçn l·∫°i.
üí° D·ªÖ t√πy ch·ªânh: B·∫°n c√≥ th·ªÉ ƒë·ªïi m√†u, k√≠ch th∆∞·ªõc c·ªßa toggle b·∫±ng CSS.

üîç Nguy√™n nh√¢n v√† c√°ch kh·∫Øc ph·ª•c

1Ô∏è‚É£ B·∫°n ch∆∞a s·ª≠ d·ª•ng ƒë√∫ng phi√™n b·∫£n Bootstrap

  • B·∫°n ƒëang d√πng Bootstrap 4.3.1, nh∆∞ng l·∫°i d√πng thu·ªôc t√≠nh data-bs-toggle, ƒë√¢y l√† thu·ªôc t√≠nh c·ªßa Bootstrap 5.
  • V·ªõi Bootstrap 4, b·∫°n c·∫ßn d√πng data-toggle thay v√¨ data-bs-toggle.

‚úÖ C√°ch s·ª≠a:

  class="navbar-toggler"
  type="button"
  data-toggle="collapse" 
  data-target="#navbarNav"
>

2Ô∏è‚É£ Thi·∫øu jQuery ho·∫∑c th∆∞ vi·ªán Bootstrap JS kh√¥ng ƒë√∫ng th·ª© t·ª±

3Ô∏è‚É£ Ki·ªÉm tra m√£ HTML c·ªßa b·∫°n c√≥ l·ªói c√∫ ph√°p

üî• Code Navbar chu·∫©n cho Bootstrap 5

html

<html lang="vi">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>Hanstudio - InfiniteElegance</title>

    <!-- Bootstrap 5 CSS -->
    <link href="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/bootstrap@5.3.2/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css" rel="stylesheet">

    <!-- Favicon -->
    <link rel="shortcut icon" href="img/favicon/logo_icon_Hanstudio.jpg" type="image/x-icon">

    <!-- Custom CSS -->
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="css/style.css">
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="css/navbar.css">
</head>
<body>

    <!-- Navbar -->
    <nav class="navbar navbar-expand-lg fixed-top bg-white shadow-sm">
      <div class="container">
        <!-- Logo -->
        <a href="#" class="navbar-brand">
          <img src="img/favicon/logo_icon_Hanstudio.jpg" alt="Hanstudio Logo" class="logo" width="100">
        </a>

        <!-- Toggle Button -->
        <button class="navbar-toggler" type="button" data-bs-toggle="collapse" data-bs-target="#navbarNav">
          <span class="navbar-toggler-icon"></span>
        </button>

        <!-- Menu -->
        <div class="collapse navbar-collapse" id="navbarNav">
          <ul class="navbar-nav ms-auto">
            <li class="nav-item"><a href="#home" class="nav-link">Trang Ch·ªß</a></li>
            <li class="nav-item"><a href="#services" class="nav-link">D·ªãch V·ª•</a></li>

          </ul>
        </div>
      </div>
    </nav>

    <!-- Bootstrap 5 JS -->
    <script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/bootstrap@5.3.2/dist/js/bootstrap.bundle.min.js"></script>

</body>
</html>

üî• C√°ch 1: Th√™m Padding cho body (Khuy·∫øn ngh·ªã)

üîπ C√°ch 1: D√πng ms-3 c·ªßa Bootstrap 5 (Khuy·∫øn ngh·ªã)

  • N·∫øu mu·ªën xa h∆°n, thay ms-3 th√†nh ms-4 ho·∫∑c ms-5.

üîπ C√°ch 2: D√πng CSS Tu·ª≥ Ch·ªânh

üî• K·∫øt lu·∫≠n

  • D√πng ms-3 n·∫øu b·∫°n mu·ªën √°p d·ª•ng nhanh, ph√π h·ª£p v·ªõi Bootstrap.
  • D√πng CSS ri√™ng n·∫øu mu·ªën tu·ª≥ ch·ªânh ch√≠nh x√°c theo px.

‚úÖ C√°ch th√™m d·∫•u | ph√¢n c√°ch gi·ªØa c√°c m·ª•c trong menu Navbar

üîπ C√°ch 1: D√πng border-right trong CSS (Khuy·∫øn ngh·ªã)

üí° D·ªÖ qu·∫£n l√Ω, kh√¥ng c·∫ßn ch·ªânh HTML qu√° nhi·ªÅu.

‚úÖ C·∫≠p nh·∫≠t CSS (navbar.css)

    position: relative;
    padding: 0 12px; /* Kho·∫£ng c√°ch gi·ªØa c√°c m·ª•c */

    transform: translateY(-50%);
    color: #8c8c8c; /* M√†u d·∫•u | (c√≥ th·ªÉ thay ƒë·ªïi) */

    background-color: #fff;
    padding: 10px 20px;
    box-shadow: 0 4px 6px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);

    width: auto;
    max-width: 150px;
}

}

    font-family: "Playfair Display", serif;
    color: #333333;
    padding: 10px 15px;
    transition: color 0.3s ease-in-out;
}

    color: #9ea36b;

}

    position: relative;

    position: absolute;
    right: 0;

    transition: all 0.5s ease-in-out;
}

.btn-cta:hover {
    background: #9ea36b;
    color: white;
    font-size: larger;
}

3. S·ª≠a m·ªôt s·ªë ph·∫ßn CSS v·ªÅ hover v√† padding

    background-color: #fff;

    color: #9ea36b;
    font-weight: 900;
}

    padding: 0 15px; /* TƒÉng kho·∫£ng c√°ch gi·ªØa c√°c m·ª•c */

    transition: all 0.5s ease-in-out;
}

.btn-cta:hover {
    background: #9ea36b;
    color: white;
    font-size: larger;
}

ƒêi·ªÅu ch·ªânh v√† c·∫£i ti·∫øn:

  1. Padding c·ªßa c√°c m·ª•c menu (padding: 0 15px): TƒÉng kho·∫£ng c√°ch gi·ªØa c√°c m·ª•c menu ƒë·ªÉ tr√¥ng tho√°ng v√† d·ªÖ ƒë·ªçc h∆°n.
  2. D·∫•u ph√¢n c√°ch "|": Ch·∫Øc ch·∫Øn ch·ªâ xu·∫•t hi·ªán gi·ªØa c√°c m·ª•c v√† kh√¥ng b·ªã l·∫∑p l·∫°i cho m·ª•c FAQ (s·ª≠ d·ª•ng .FAQ::after { content: ""; } ƒë·ªÉ x√≥a d·∫•u ph√¢n c√°ch cho m·ª•c n√†y).

    C√°ch kh·∫Øc ph·ª•c: ƒê·∫£m b·∫£o r·∫±ng b·∫°n ƒë·∫∑t m√£ CSS x√≥a d·∫•u | cho m·ª•c FAQ sau c√°c m√£ CSS kh√°c ƒë·ªÉ ƒë·∫£m b·∫£o t√≠nh ∆∞u ti√™n c·ªßa n√≥.

  3. Ki·ªÉm tra CSS c√≥ ƒë∆∞·ª£c √°p d·ª•ng ƒë√∫ng kh√¥ng: ƒê·∫£m b·∫£o r·∫±ng t·ªáp CSS c·ªßa b·∫°n ƒë∆∞·ª£c link ƒë√∫ng v√†o HTML v√† kh√¥ng c√≥ l·ªói trong ƒë∆∞·ªùng d·∫´n. N·∫øu t·ªáp CSS kh√¥ng ƒë∆∞·ª£c t·∫£i, c√°c thay ƒë·ªïi s·∫Ω kh√¥ng c√≥ hi·ªáu l·ª±c.

    Ki·ªÉm tra ƒë∆∞·ªùng d·∫´n CSS:

    html
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="css/style.css" />

  4. K√≠ch ho·∫°t l·∫°i l·∫°i tr√¨nh duy·ªát (hard reload): ƒê√¥i khi tr√¨nh duy·ªát c√≥ th·ªÉ cache c√°c thay ƒë·ªïi CSS c≈©. H√£y th·ª≠ th·ª±c hi·ªán m·ªôt "hard reload" ho·∫∑c l√†m m·ªõi cache tr√¨nh duy·ªát.

    • C√°ch th·ª±c hi·ªán hard reload:
      • Chrome: Ctrl + Shift + R (Windows) ho·∫∑c Cmd + Shift + R (Mac).
      • Firefox: Ctrl + F5 (Windows) ho·∫∑c Cmd + Shift + R (Mac).

N·∫øu b·∫°n ƒë√£ ki·ªÉm tra t·∫•t c·∫£ nh·ªØng ƒëi·ªÅu tr√™n m√† v·∫´n kh√¥ng th√†nh c√¥ng, b·∫°n c√≥ th·ªÉ th·ª≠ th√™m !important v√†o content: "" ƒë·ªÉ ƒë·∫£m b·∫£o r·∫±ng n√≥ kh√¥ng b·ªã ghi ƒë√® b·ªüi c√°c quy t·∫Øc CSS kh√°c.

C·∫≠p nh·∫≠t CSS v·ªõi !important:

css
/* X√≥a d·∫•u ph√¢n c√°ch cho m·ª•c FAQ */
.navbar-nav .FAQ::after {
    content: "" !important;  /* Kh√¥ng hi·ªÉn th·ªã d·∫•u | */
}

H√£y th·ª≠ c√°c b∆∞·ªõc n√†y v√† ki·ªÉm tra l·∫°i xem v·∫•n ƒë·ªÅ c√≥ ƒë∆∞·ª£c gi·∫£i quy·∫øt kh√¥ng.

B·∫°n ƒë√£ n√≥i:

    background-color: #fff;
    padding: 10px 20px;

    font-family: "playfair Display", serif;
    color: #333333;
    padding: 10px 15px;
    transition: color 0.3s ease-in-out;
}

    color: #9ea36b;
    font-weight: 900;
}

    position: relative; 
    padding: 0 7px;
}

    position: absolute;
    right: 0;
    top: 50%;

ChatGPT ƒë√£ n√≥i:

ƒê·ªÉ khi s·ª≠ d·ª•ng menu cu·ªôn xu·ªëng m√† d·∫•u "|" kh√¥ng xu·∫•t hi·ªán, b·∫°n c√≥ th·ªÉ √°p d·ª•ng m·ªôt s·ªë thay ƒë·ªïi trong CSS. C·ª• th·ªÉ, b·∫°n c·∫ßn th√™m m·ªôt l·ªõp CSS ki·ªÉm tra khi menu ƒëang ·ªü tr·∫°ng th√°i "ƒë∆∞·ª£c cu·ªôn xu·ªëng" (ƒë∆∞·ª£c ·∫©n ƒëi). B·∫°n c√≥ th·ªÉ s·ª≠ d·ª•ng CSS ƒë·ªÉ ƒëi·ªÅu ch·ªânh d·∫•u "|" khi navbar ·ªü tr·∫°ng th√°i cu·ªôn.

C√°ch ch·ªânh s·ª≠a:

  1. Th√™m position: sticky cho navbar, gi√∫p menu d√≠nh v√†o ph·∫ßn ƒë·∫ßu trang khi cu·ªôn xu·ªëng.
  2. Th√™m CSS ƒë·ªÉ ki·ªÉm tra khi navbar cu·ªôn xu·ªëng th√¨ kh√¥ng hi·ªÉn th·ªã d·∫•u "|".

D∆∞·ªõi ƒë√¢y l√† ƒëo·∫°n m√£ ƒë√£ ch·ªânh s·ª≠a:

CSS:

css
/* m·∫∑c ƒë·ªãnh */
.navbar {
    background-color: #fff;
    padding: 10px 20px;
    box-shadow: 0 4px 6px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
    transition: all 0.3s ease-in-out;
    position: sticky;
    top: 0;
    z-index: 999;
}


/* logo */
.logo {
    height: 50px;
    width: auto;
    max-width: 150px;
}

.logo:hover {
    border-radius: 20px;
    border: 1px solid #d3d3d3;
}

/* menu */
.navbar-nav .nav-link {
    font-family: "Playfair Display", serif;
    color: #333333;
    padding: 10px 15px;
    transition: color 0.3s ease-in-out;
}

/* hover */
.navbar-nav .nav-link:hover {
    color: #9ea36b;
    font-weight: 900;
}

/* item */
.navbar-nav .nav-item {
    position: relative;
    padding: 0 7px;
}

.navbar-nav .nav-item:not(:last-child)::after {
    content: "|";
    position: absolute;
    right: 0;
    top: 50%;
    transform: translateY(-50%);
    color: #8c8c8c;
}

/* X√≥a d·∫•u '|' khi navbar ·ªü tr·∫°ng th√°i cu·ªôn xu·ªëng */
.navbar.navbar-scrolled .navbar-nav .nav-item:not(:last-child)::after {
    content: "";
}

/* khi navbar cu·ªôn xu·ªëng */
.navbar.navbar-scrolled {
    background-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.9); /* Th√™m hi·ªáu ·ª©ng m·ªù */
    box-shadow: 0 4px 6px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2);
}

/* nut lien he */
.btn-cta {
    border-radius: 20px;
    border: 2px solid #9ea36b;
    color: #9ea36b;
    transition: all 0.5s ease-in-out;
}

.btn-cta:hover {
    background: #9ea36b;
    color: white;
    font-size: larger;
}

JavaScript (Th√™m v√†o ƒë·ªÉ x·ª≠ l√Ω cu·ªôn):

Th√™m m√£ JavaScript n√†y v√†o cu·ªëi <body> ƒë·ªÉ th√™m l·ªõp navbar-scrolled khi b·∫°n cu·ªôn xu·ªëng:

javascript
// Th√™m ho·∫∑c x√≥a l·ªõp navbar-scrolled khi cu·ªôn
window.addEventListener('scroll', function () {
  const navbar = document.querySelector('.navbar');
  if (window.scrollY > 50) {
    navbar.classList.add('navbar-scrolled');
  } else {
    navbar.classList.remove('navbar-scrolled');
  }
});

Gi·∫£i th√≠ch:

  1. position: sticky gi·ªØ thanh ƒëi·ªÅu h∆∞·ªõng ·ªü ƒë·∫ßu trang khi b·∫°n cu·ªôn xu·ªëng.
  2. Khi b·∫°n cu·ªôn trang xu·ªëng (d∆∞·ªõi 50px), l·ªõp .navbar-scrolled ƒë∆∞·ª£c th√™m v√†o, l√†m cho navbar c√≥ n·ªÅn m·ªù v√† x√≥a d·∫•u "|".
  3. Th√™m background-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.9) trong l·ªõp .navbar-scrolled ƒë·ªÉ t·∫°o hi·ªáu ·ª©ng m·ªù cho navbar khi cu·ªôn.

H√£y th·ª≠ √°p d·ª•ng v√† ki·ªÉm tra xem k·∫øt qu·∫£ ƒë√£ ƒë√∫ng nh∆∞ mong mu·ªën ch∆∞a nh√©!

B·∫°n ƒë√£ n√≥i:
t√¥i mu·ªën b·ªè √Ω t∆∞·ªüng menu cu·ªôn v√† ƒë·∫∑t l·∫°i nh∆∞ c≈©
ChatGPT ƒë√£ n√≥i:

N·∫øu b·∫°n mu·ªën b·ªè √Ω t∆∞·ªüng menu cu·ªôn v√† ƒë·∫∑t l·∫°i nh∆∞ ban ƒë·∫ßu, b·∫°n c√≥ th·ªÉ l√†m nh∆∞ sau:

1. C·∫≠p nh·∫≠t CSS

  • Lo·∫°i b·ªè position: sticky; top: 0; z-index: 999; trong .navbar.
  • Gi·ªØ nguy√™n ph·∫ßn CSS hi·ªÉn th·ªã d·∫•u | gi·ªØa c√°c m·ª•c trong menu.
  • Lo·∫°i b·ªè ƒëo·∫°n CSS .navbar-scrolled.

D∆∞·ªõi ƒë√¢y l√† phi√™n b·∫£n c·∫≠p nh·∫≠t c·ªßa CSS:

css
/* m·∫∑c ƒë·ªãnh */
.navbar {
    background-color: #fff;
    padding: 10px 20px;
    box-shadow: 0 4px 6px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
    transition: all 0.3s ease-in-out;
}

/* logo */
.logo {
    height: 50px;
    width: auto;
    max-width: 150px;
}

.logo:hover {
    border-radius: 20px;
    border: 1px solid #d3d3d3;
}

/* menu */
.navbar-nav .nav-link {
    font-family: "Playfair Display", serif;
    color: #333333;
    padding: 10px 15px;
    transition: color 0.3s ease-in-out;
}

/* hover */
.navbar-nav .nav-link:hover {
    color: #9ea36b;
    font-weight: 900;
}

/* item */
.navbar-nav .nav-item {
    position: relative;
    padding: 0 7px;
}

.navbar-nav .nav-item:not(:last-child)::after {
    content: "|";
    position: absolute;
    right: 0;
    top: 50%;
    transform: translateY(-50%);
    color: #8c8c8c;
}

/* nut lien he */
.btn-cta {
    border-radius: 20px;
    border: 2px solid #9ea36b;
    color: #9ea36b;
    transition: all 0.5s ease-in-out;
}

.btn-cta:hover {
    background: #9ea36b;
    color: white;
    font-size: larger;
}

2. Lo·∫°i b·ªè JavaScript

  • N·∫øu b·∫°n ƒë√£ th√™m ƒëo·∫°n JavaScript ƒë·ªÉ x·ª≠ l√Ω menu cu·ªôn, h√£y x√≥a b·ªè ho√†n to√†n ƒëo·∫°n n√†y:
javascript
// X√ìA B·ªé ƒêO·∫†N N√ÄY
window.addEventListener('scroll', function () {
  const navbar = document.querySelector('.navbar');
  if (window.scrollY > 50) {
    navbar.classList.add('navbar-scrolled');
  } else {
    navbar.classList.remove('navbar-scrolled');
  }
});

  <div class="container">

CSS (about.css)

css
.about-section {
    padding: 80px 0;
    background-color: #f8f9fa;
    text-align: left;
}

.about-title {
    font-family: "Playfair Display", serif;
    font-size: 2.5rem;
    font-weight: bold;
    color: #333;
    animation: slide-in-left 1s ease-in-out;
}

.about-text {
    font-size: 1.1rem;
    color: #555;
    margin-bottom: 15px;
    animation: fade-in 1s ease-in-out;
}

.about-image {
    text-align: center;
}

.about-image img {
    border-radius: 15px;
    box-shadow: 0px 5px 15px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
}

/* Button */
.btn-explore {
    display: inline-block;
    padding: 12px 24px;
    border: 2px solid #9ea36b;
    color: #9ea36b;
    border-radius: 25px;
    text-decoration: none;
    transition: all 0.3s ease-in-out;
    font-weight: bold;
}

.btn-explore:hover {
    background-color: #9ea36b;
    color: #fff;
}

/* Animations */
@keyframes slide-in-left {
    from {
        opacity: 0;
        transform: translateX(-50px);
    }
    to {
        opacity: 1;
        transform: translateX(0);
    }
}

@keyframes fade-in {
    from {
        opacity: 0;
    }
    to {
        opacity: 1;
    }
}

.fade-in {
    animation: fade-in 1.5s ease-in-out;
}

Gi·∫£i th√≠ch hi·ªáu ·ª©ng:

  • Ti√™u ƒë·ªÅ (.about-title) c√≥ hi·ªáu ·ª©ng tr∆∞·ª£t t·ª´ tr√°i v√†o (slide-in-left).
  • ƒêo·∫°n vƒÉn b·∫£n (.about-text) c√≥ hi·ªáu ·ª©ng m·ªù d·∫ßn xu·∫•t hi·ªán (fade-in).
  • H√¨nh ·∫£nh (.about-image img) c√≥ hi·ªáu ·ª©ng m·ªù d·∫ßn xu·∫•t hi·ªán (fade-in) khi trang t·∫£i.

B·∫°n c√≥ mu·ªën th√™m hi·ªáu ·ª©ng scroll animation ƒë·ªÉ khi cu·ªôn xu·ªëng ph·∫ßn gi·ªõi thi·ªáu m·ªõi hi·ªÉn th·ªã hi·ªáu ·ª©ng kh√¥ng?

B·∫°n ƒë√£ n√≥i:

CSS (home.css)

    color: white;
}

/* Ti√™u ƒë·ªÅ ch√≠nh */
.home-title {
    font-family: "Playfair Display", serif;
    font-size: 3.5rem;
    font-weight: bold;
    animation: fade-in-down 1s ease-in-out;
}

/* Ph·ª• ƒë·ªÅ */
.home-subtitle {
    font-size: 1.5rem;
    margin-top: 10px;
    animation: fade-in 1.5s ease-in-out;
}

/* N√∫t CTA */
.btn-discover {
    margin-top: 20px;
    padding: 12px 24px;
    border: 2px solid white;
    color: white;
    border-radius: 25px;
    text-decoration: none;
    transition: all 0.3s ease-in-out;
    font-weight: bold;
    display: inline-block;
}

.btn-discover:hover {
    background-color: white;
    color: black;
}

/* Animations */
@keyframes fade-in-down {
    from {
        opacity: 0;
        transform: translateY(-30px);
    }
    to {
        opacity: 1;
        transform: translateY(0);
    }
}

@keyframes fade-in {
    from {
        opacity: 0;
    }
    to {
        opacity: 1;
    }
}

T√≠nh nƒÉng n·ªïi b·∫≠t

‚úÖ ·∫¢nh n·ªÅn ƒë·ªông: S·ª≠ d·ª•ng h√¨nh n·ªÅn to√†n m√†n h√¨nh v·ªõi l·ªõp ph·ªß m√†u t·ªëi gi√∫p n·ªôi dung n·ªïi b·∫≠t.
‚úÖ Hi·ªáu ·ª©ng animation:

  • Ti√™u ƒë·ªÅ tr∆∞·ª£t xu·ªëng m∆∞·ª£t m√† (fade-in-down).
  • Ph·ª• ƒë·ªÅ xu·∫•t hi·ªán d·∫ßn d·∫ßn (fade-in).
    ‚úÖ N√∫t CTA n·ªïi b·∫≠t: Khi di chu·ªôt v√†o, n√∫t chuy·ªÉn m√†u tr·∫Øng ƒë·ªÉ thu h√∫t s·ª± ch√∫ √Ω.

B·∫°n c√≥ mu·ªën th√™m hi·ªáu ·ª©ng cu·ªôn ƒë·ªÉ khi trang web load xong m·ªõi hi·ªÉn th·ªã kh√¥ng?

‚úÖ Ti√™u ƒë·ªÅ h·∫•p d·∫´n: "N∆°i Ngh·ªá Thu·∫≠t G·∫∑p G·ª° S·ª± Ho√†n M·ªπ" t·∫°o ·∫•n t∆∞·ª£ng ngay t·ª´ ƒë·∫ßu.

üöÄ ƒêi·ªÉm n√¢ng c·∫•p

‚úÖ Ch·ªâ s·ª≠ d·ª•ng ƒë∆°n v·ªã px ƒë·ªÉ ƒë·∫£m b·∫£o thi·∫øt k·∫ø c·ªë ƒë·ªãnh, kh√¥ng b·ªã thay ƒë·ªïi khi m√†n h√¨nh thay ƒë·ªïi t·ª∑ l·ªá.
‚úÖ K√≠ch th∆∞·ªõc ti√™u chu·∫©n cho ti√™u ƒë·ªÅ, ph·ª• ƒë·ªÅ v√† h√¨nh ·∫£nh ƒë·ªÉ ƒë·∫£m b·∫£o ƒë·ªô r√µ r√†ng.
‚úÖ Hi·ªáu ·ª©ng animation m∆∞·ª£t m√† v·ªõi @keyframes.

B·∫°n c√≥ mu·ªën th√™m hi·ªáu ·ª©ng xu·∫•t hi·ªán d·∫ßn khi cu·ªôn kh√¥ng? üöÄ

B·∫°n ƒë√£ n√≥i:
l√†m sao ƒë·ªÉ anh v·ª´a kh·ªõp v·ªõi khung
ChatGPT ƒë√£ n√≥i:

ƒê·ªÉ ƒë·∫£m b·∫£o h√¨nh ·∫£nh v·ª´a kh·ªõp v·ªõi khung m√† v·∫´n gi·ªØ ƒë∆∞·ª£c t·ª∑ l·ªá, b·∫°n c√≥ th·ªÉ s·ª≠ d·ª•ng CSS object-fit ho·∫∑c flexbox/grid ƒë·ªÉ ki·ªÉm so√°t k√≠ch th∆∞·ªõc h·ª£p l√Ω h∆°n. D∆∞·ªõi ƒë√¢y l√† c√°c c√°ch t·ªëi ∆∞u:

üéØ C√°ch 1: D√πng object-fit (Khuy√™n d√πng)

Th√™m thu·ªôc t√≠nh object-fit: cover; v√†o ·∫£nh ƒë·ªÉ ƒë·∫£m b·∫£o n√≥ kh√¥ng b·ªã m√©o m√† v·∫´n v·ª´a kh√≠t khung:

CSS

    width: 100%; /* ƒê·∫£m b·∫£o h√¨nh ·∫£nh lu√¥n chi·∫øm to√†n b·ªô ph·∫ßn t·ª≠ cha */
    height: 400px; /* ƒê·∫∑t chi·ªÅu cao c·ªë ƒë·ªãnh */
    object-fit: cover; /* C·∫Øt ·∫£nh ƒë·ªÉ kh·ªõp k√≠ch th∆∞·ªõc m√† kh√¥ng m√©o */
    border-radius: 15px;
    box-shadow: 0px 8px 16px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2);
    animation: fade-in 1500ms ease-in-out;
}

üîπ ∆Øu ƒëi·ªÉm: Gi·ªØ nguy√™n t·ª∑ l·ªá ·∫£nh, c·∫Øt ph·∫ßn d∆∞ ƒë·ªÉ kh·ªõp v·ªõi khung m√† kh√¥ng b·ªã m√©o.

üéØ C√°ch 2: D√πng Flexbox ƒë·ªÉ cƒÉn ch·ªânh ·∫£nh v√† n·ªôi dung

N·∫øu mu·ªën ·∫£nh lu√¥n c√¢n ƒë·ªëi v·ªõi n·ªôi dung b√™n c·∫°nh, d√πng flexbox ƒë·ªÉ chia layout:

CSS

    display: flex;
    align-items: center; /* CƒÉn gi·ªØa theo chi·ªÅu d·ªçc */
}

    width: 100%;
    max-width: 450px; /* ƒê·∫£m b·∫£o kh√¥ng qu√° to */
    height: auto; /* Gi·ªØ nguy√™n t·ª∑ l·ªá */
    border-radius: 15px;
}

üîπ ∆Øu ƒëi·ªÉm: H√¨nh ·∫£nh kh√¥ng b·ªã m√©o, t·ª± ƒëi·ªÅu ch·ªânh linh ho·∫°t theo b·ªë c·ª•c.

üéØ C√°ch 3: D√πng Grid (n·∫øu c·∫ßn cƒÉn ch·ªânh n√¢ng cao)

N·∫øu th√≠ch b·ªë c·ª•c c·ª©ng c√°p h∆°n, d√πng CSS Grid:

CSS

css

    display: grid;
    grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr; /* Chia layout 50-50 */
    align-items: center;
}

.home-image {
    width: 100%;
    height: 400px;
    object-fit: cover;
}

üîπ ∆Øu ƒëi·ªÉm: Ki·ªÉm so√°t layout t·ªët, ƒë·∫∑c bi·ªát khi c√≥ nhi·ªÅu ph·∫ßn t·ª≠ con.

üí° T·ªïng k·∫øt:

  • N·∫øu mu·ªën ·∫£nh t·ª± c·∫Øt cho v·ª´a khung ‚ûù D√πng object-fit: cover; ‚úÖ
  • N·∫øu mu·ªën ·∫£nh lu√¥n cƒÉn gi·ªØa v·ªõi n·ªôi dung ‚ûù D√πng display: flex; align-items: center; ‚úÖ
  • N·∫øu mu·ªën b·ªë c·ª•c ch√≠nh x√°c h∆°n ‚ûù D√πng CSS Grid ‚úÖ

B·∫°n mu·ªën √°p d·ª•ng c√°ch n√†o? üöÄ

B·∫°n ƒë√£ n√≥i:
xin l·ªói nh∆∞ l√∫c n√£y l√† ·ªïn r·ªìi gi·ªù th√¨ b·∫°n h√£y gi·∫£i th√≠ch code css cho t√¥i hi·ªÉu ƒëi
ChatGPT ƒë√£ n√≥i:

Kh√¥ng sao c·∫£! D∆∞·ªõi ƒë√¢y l√† gi·∫£i th√≠ch chi ti·∫øt v·ªÅ ph·∫ßn CSS b·∫°n ƒë√£ s·ª≠ d·ª•ng cho ·∫£nh v√† n·ªôi dung trong ph·∫ßn trang ch·ªß:

1. Ph·∫ßn CSS cho .home-image

css
.home-image {
    width: 100%; /* ƒê·∫£m b·∫£o h√¨nh ·∫£nh chi·∫øm 100% chi·ªÅu r·ªông c·ªßa ph·∫ßn t·ª≠ ch·ª©a */
    height: 400px; /* ƒê·∫∑t chi·ªÅu cao c·ªßa h√¨nh ·∫£nh c·ªë ƒë·ªãnh, b·∫°n c√≥ th·ªÉ ƒëi·ªÅu ch·ªânh theo √Ω mu·ªën */
    object-fit: cover; /* C·∫Øt ·∫£nh sao cho n√≥ bao ph·ªß ho√†n to√†n ph·∫ßn kh√¥ng gian m√† kh√¥ng b·ªã m√©o */
    border-radius: 15px; /* L√†m bo g√≥c c·ªßa ·∫£nh ƒë·ªÉ t·∫°o hi·ªáu ·ª©ng m∆∞·ª£t m√† */
    box-shadow: 0px 8px 16px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2); /* Th√™m b√≥ng ƒë·ªï cho ·∫£nh, l√†m n√≥ n·ªïi b·∫≠t h∆°n tr√™n n·ªÅn */
    animation: fade-in 1500ms ease-in-out; /* √Åp d·ª•ng hi·ªáu ·ª©ng animation ƒë·ªÉ ·∫£nh d·∫ßn hi·ªán l√™n */
}

Gi·∫£i th√≠ch t·ª´ng thu·ªôc t√≠nh:

  1. width: 100%;

    • M·ª•c ƒë√≠ch: ƒê·∫£m b·∫£o r·∫±ng h√¨nh ·∫£nh s·∫Ω chi·∫øm to√†n b·ªô chi·ªÅu r·ªông c·ªßa ph·∫ßn t·ª≠ ch·ª©a (v√≠ d·ª• nh∆∞ m·ªôt <div> hay m·ªôt ph·∫ßn t·ª≠ bao quanh ·∫£nh). ƒêi·ªÅu n√†y gi√∫p ·∫£nh c√≥ th·ªÉ t·ª± ƒë·ªông ƒëi·ªÅu ch·ªânh khi ƒë·ªô r·ªông c·ªßa m√†n h√¨nh thay ƒë·ªïi.

  2. height: 400px;

    • M·ª•c ƒë√≠ch: ƒê·∫∑t chi·ªÅu cao c·ªßa ·∫£nh c·ªë ƒë·ªãnh l√† 400px. ƒêi·ªÅu n√†y ƒë·∫£m b·∫£o r·∫±ng ·∫£nh s·∫Ω lu√¥n c√≥ chi·ªÅu cao c·ªë ƒë·ªãnh d√π cho ph·∫ßn t·ª≠ ch·ª©a c√≥ thay ƒë·ªïi k√≠ch th∆∞·ªõc. B·∫°n c√≥ th·ªÉ thay ƒë·ªïi gi√° tr·ªã n√†y t√πy theo thi·∫øt k·∫ø.

  3. object-fit: cover;

    • M·ª•c ƒë√≠ch: object-fit l√† m·ªôt thu·ªôc t√≠nh gi√∫p ki·ªÉm so√°t c√°ch th·ª©c ·∫£nh ƒë∆∞·ª£c x·ª≠ l√Ω trong m·ªôt kh√¥ng gian x√°c ƒë·ªãnh (ph·∫ßn t·ª≠ ch·ª©a).
      • cover c√≥ nghƒ©a l√† ·∫£nh s·∫Ω t·ª± ƒë·ªông "c·∫Øt" sao cho v·ª´a kh·ªõp v·ªõi ph·∫ßn kh√¥ng gian, nh∆∞ng v·∫´n gi·ªØ nguy√™n t·ª∑ l·ªá v√† kh√¥ng b·ªã m√©o. Ph·∫ßn ·∫£nh n√†o kh√¥ng v·ª´a s·∫Ω b·ªã c·∫Øt b·ªõt ƒëi.
      • N·∫øu d√πng contain, ·∫£nh s·∫Ω co l·∫°i ƒë·ªÉ ho√†n to√†n n·∫±m trong kh√¥ng gian ch·ª©a, nh∆∞ng c√≥ th·ªÉ s·∫Ω ƒë·ªÉ l·∫°i kho·∫£ng tr·∫Øng.

  4. border-radius: 15px;

    • M·ª•c ƒë√≠ch: T·∫°o bo g√≥c cho ·∫£nh. Thay v√¨ h√¨nh vu√¥ng, ·∫£nh s·∫Ω c√≥ c√°c g√≥c cong m·ªÅm m·∫°i, l√†m cho giao di·ªán tr√¥ng tinh t·∫ø h∆°n.

  5. box-shadow: 0px 8px 16px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2);

    • M·ª•c ƒë√≠ch: T·∫°o b√≥ng ƒë·ªï cho ·∫£nh ƒë·ªÉ t·∫°o chi·ªÅu s√¢u v√† l√†m ·∫£nh n·ªïi b·∫≠t h∆°n. C·∫•u tr√∫c c·ªßa box-shadow l√†:
      • 0px: Kho·∫£ng c√°ch b√≥ng theo chi·ªÅu ngang.
      • 8px: Kho·∫£ng c√°ch b√≥ng theo chi·ªÅu d·ªçc.
      • 16px: ƒê·ªô m·ªù c·ªßa b√≥ng.
      • rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2): M√†u s·∫Øc c·ªßa b√≥ng v·ªõi ƒë·ªô trong su·ªët 20% (0.2).

  6. animation: fade-in 1500ms ease-in-out;

    • M·ª•c ƒë√≠ch: √Åp d·ª•ng hi·ªáu ·ª©ng ho·∫°t h√¨nh khi h√¨nh ·∫£nh xu·∫•t hi·ªán. C·ª• th·ªÉ:
      • fade-in: L√† t√™n c·ªßa hi·ªáu ·ª©ng, c√≥ th·ªÉ b·∫°n ƒë√£ ƒë·ªãnh nghƒ©a ·ªü ƒë√¢u ƒë√≥ trong ph·∫ßn @keyframes.
      • 1500ms: Th·ªùi gian hi·ªáu ·ª©ng k√©o d√†i trong 1500 mili gi√¢y (1.5 gi√¢y).
      • ease-in-out: Lo·∫°i hi·ªáu ·ª©ng th·ªùi gian, c√≥ nghƒ©a l√† hi·ªáu ·ª©ng b·∫Øt ƒë·∫ßu ch·∫≠m, tƒÉng t·ªëc v√† r·ªìi l·∫°i gi·∫£m t·ªëc.

2. Ph·∫ßn CSS cho .home-section v√† .row

css
.home-section .row {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center; /* CƒÉn gi·ªØa c√°c ph·∫ßn t·ª≠ trong h√†ng theo chi·ªÅu d·ªçc */
}

Gi·∫£i th√≠ch t·ª´ng thu·ªôc t√≠nh:

  1. display: flex;

    • M·ª•c ƒë√≠ch: Thi·∫øt l·∫≠p ch·∫ø ƒë·ªô hi·ªÉn th·ªã Flexbox cho ph·∫ßn t·ª≠ .row. ƒêi·ªÅu n√†y gi√∫p cƒÉn ch·ªânh c√°c ph·∫ßn t·ª≠ con trong .row d·ªÖ d√†ng h∆°n.
    • Flexbox gi√∫p d·ªÖ d√†ng cƒÉn gi·ªØa, chia kh√¥ng gian gi·ªØa c√°c ph·∫ßn t·ª≠ m√† kh√¥ng c·∫ßn ph·∫£i s·ª≠ d·ª•ng float ho·∫∑c position.

  2. align-items: center;

    • M·ª•c ƒë√≠ch: CƒÉn gi·ªØa c√°c ph·∫ßn t·ª≠ con theo chi·ªÅu d·ªçc trong .row. N·∫øu b·∫°n c√≥ ·∫£nh v√† vƒÉn b·∫£n trong m·ªôt h√†ng, ch√∫ng s·∫Ω ƒë∆∞·ª£c cƒÉn gi·ªØa theo chi·ªÅu d·ªçc so v·ªõi nhau.

T√≥m t·∫Øt

  • B·∫°n ƒë√£ thi·∫øt k·∫ø h√¨nh ·∫£nh sao cho ph√π h·ª£p v·ªõi khung c·ªßa n√≥, gi√∫p ·∫£nh lu√¥n chi·∫øm h·∫øt chi·ªÅu r·ªông m√† kh√¥ng b·ªã m√©o (nh·ªù object-fit: cover).
  • Th√™m b√≥ng ƒë·ªï cho ·∫£nh t·∫°o chi·ªÅu s√¢u v√† hi·ªáu ·ª©ng ho·∫°t h√¨nh gi√∫p l√†m cho ·∫£nh n·ªïi b·∫≠t h∆°n.
  • Flexbox gi√∫p cƒÉn gi·ªØa c√°c ph·∫ßn t·ª≠ trong h√†ng ƒë·ªÉ b·ªë c·ª•c tr·ªü n√™n g·ªçn g√†ng, d·ªÖ nh√¨n.

N·∫øu c√≥ th√™m c√¢u h·ªèi n√†o ho·∫∑c mu·ªën ti·∫øp t·ª•c gi·∫£i th√≠ch th√™m, c·ª© tho·∫£i m√°i h·ªèi nh√©!

B·∫°n ƒë√£ n√≥i:
/* m·∫∑c ƒë·ªãnh */ .home-section { height: 700px; display: flex; align-items: center; background: linear-gradient(rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3), rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3)), url("../img/home/home-background.jpg") no-repeat center center/cover; color: white; padding: 50px; } /* h√¨nh ·∫£nh minh h·ªça */ .home-image { max-width: 500px; border-radius: 15px; box-shadow: 0px 8px 16px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2); animation: fade-in 1.5s ease-in-out; } /* Ti√™u ƒë·ªÅ */ .home-title { font-family: "Playfair Display", serif; font-size: 40px; font-weight: bold; animation: slide-in-left 1s ease-in-out; } /* subtitle */ .home-subtitle { font-size: 18px; margin-top: 10px; line-height: 28px; animation: fade-in 1.5s ease-in-out; } /* CTA */ .btn-discover { margin-top: 20px; padding: 12px 24px; border: 2px solid white; color: white; border-radius: 25px; text-decoration: none; transition: all 0.3s ease-in-out; font-weight: bold; display: inline-block; font-size: 18px; } .btn-discover:hover { background-color: white; color: black; } /* Animations */ @keyframes slide-in-left { from { opacity: 0; transform: translateX(-30px); } to { opacity: 1; transform: translateX(0px); } } @keyframes fade-in { from { opacity: 0; } to { opacity: 1; } } (c·∫£i thi·ªán hi·ªáu qu·∫£ hi·ªÉn th·ªã, m√†u s·∫Øc ng·∫£ m√†u x√≠u r·ªìi ƒë·∫£m b·∫£o ƒë·ªÉ ch·ªØ kh√¥ng ƒë√® l√™n h√¨nh ·∫£nh minh h·ªça n·ªØa)
ChatGPT ƒë√£ n√≥i:

D∆∞·ªõi ƒë√¢y l√† c√°ch c·∫£i thi·ªán hi·ªáu qu·∫£ hi·ªÉn th·ªã v√† m√†u s·∫Øc c·ªßa ph·∫ßn trang ch·ªß, ƒë·ªìng th·ªùi ƒë·∫£m b·∫£o ch·ªØ kh√¥ng b·ªã ƒë√® l√™n h√¨nh ·∫£nh minh h·ªça:

1. C·∫£i thi·ªán hi·ªáu qu·∫£ hi·ªÉn th·ªã v√† m√†u s·∫Øc:

  • S·ª≠ d·ª•ng gradient m∆∞·ª£t m√† h∆°n ƒë·ªÉ l√†m n·ªïi b·∫≠t vƒÉn b·∫£n m√† kh√¥ng l√†m m·∫•t ƒëi h√¨nh ·∫£nh minh h·ªça.
  • TƒÉng ƒë·ªô t∆∞∆°ng ph·∫£n c·ªßa vƒÉn b·∫£n v·ªõi n·ªÅn b·∫±ng c√°ch thay ƒë·ªïi ƒë·ªô m·ªù c·ªßa m√†u gradient ho·∫∑c thay ƒë·ªïi m√†u s·∫Øc ch·ªØ ƒë·ªÉ d·ªÖ ƒë·ªçc h∆°n.
  • ƒê·∫£m b·∫£o ch·ªØ kh√¥ng b·ªã ƒë√® l√™n ·∫£nh b·∫±ng c√°ch ƒëi·ªÅu ch·ªânh kho·∫£ng c√°ch v√† k√≠ch th∆∞·ªõc.

2. Code CSS c·∫£i ti·∫øn:

css
/* m·∫∑c ƒë·ªãnh */
.home-section {
    height: 700px;
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    background: linear-gradient(rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5), rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5)), 
    url("../img/home/home-background.jpg") no-repeat center center/cover;
    color: white;
    padding: 50px;
    background-position: center;
    background-size: cover;
    position: relative;
}

/* h√¨nh ·∫£nh minh h·ªça */
.home-image {
    max-width: 500px;
    width: 100%;
    height: auto;
    border-radius: 15px;
    box-shadow: 0px 8px 16px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2);
    animation: fade-in 1.5s ease-in-out;
    object-fit: cover; /* ƒê·∫£m b·∫£o h√¨nh ·∫£nh kh√¥ng b·ªã m√©o */
}

/* Ti√™u ƒë·ªÅ */
.home-title {
    font-family: "Playfair Display", serif;
    font-size: 40px;
    font-weight: bold;
    animation: slide-in-left 1s ease-in-out;
    margin-bottom: 20px;
    z-index: 2; /* ƒê·∫£m b·∫£o ti√™u ƒë·ªÅ kh√¥ng b·ªã ƒë√® l√™n h√¨nh ·∫£nh */
}

/* subtitle */
.home-subtitle {
    font-size: 18px;
    margin-top: 10px;
    line-height: 28px;
    animation: fade-in 1.5s ease-in-out;
    z-index: 2;
}

/* CTA */
.btn-discover {
    margin-top: 20px;
    padding: 12px 24px;
    border: 2px solid white;
    color: white;
    border-radius: 25px;
    text-decoration: none;
    transition: all 0.3s ease-in-out;
    font-weight: bold;
    display: inline-block;
    font-size: 18px;
    z-index: 2;
}

.btn-discover:hover {
    background-color: white;
    color: black;
}

/* Animations */
@keyframes slide-in-left {
    from {
        opacity: 0;
        transform: translateX(-30px);
    }
    to {
        opacity: 1;
        transform: translateX(0px);
    }
}

@keyframes fade-in {
    from {
        opacity: 0;
    }
    to {
        opacity: 1;
    }
}

Gi·∫£i th√≠ch c√°c thay ƒë·ªïi:

  1. Gradient c·∫£i ti·∫øn cho ph·∫ßn n·ªÅn (.home-section):

    • rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5): M√†u gradient c√≥ ƒë·ªô m·ªù cao h∆°n (0.5 thay v√¨ 0.3) gi√∫p vƒÉn b·∫£n n·ªïi b·∫≠t h∆°n so v·ªõi h√¨nh ·∫£nh n·ªÅn.
    • S·ª≠ d·ª•ng background-position v√† background-size ƒë·ªÉ ƒë·∫£m b·∫£o h√¨nh ·∫£nh lu√¥n hi·ªÉn th·ªã ƒë·∫πp d√π k√≠ch th∆∞·ªõc m√†n h√¨nh thay ƒë·ªïi.

  2. H√¨nh ·∫£nh minh h·ªça (.home-image):

    • object-fit: cover;: ƒê·∫£m b·∫£o ·∫£nh kh√¥ng b·ªã m√©o khi thu nh·ªè, t·ª± ƒë·ªông ƒëi·ªÅu ch·ªânh ƒë·ªÉ bao ph·ªß to√†n b·ªô kh√¥ng gian.
    • max-width: 500px; v√† width: 100%;: ƒê·∫£m b·∫£o ·∫£nh c√≥ k√≠ch th∆∞·ªõc ph√π h·ª£p v·ªõi m·ªçi m√†n h√¨nh v√† kh√¥ng b·ªã tr√†n ra ngo√†i.

  3. Ti√™u ƒë·ªÅ (.home-title):

    • margin-bottom: 20px;: Th√™m kho·∫£ng c√°ch d∆∞·ªõi ti√™u ƒë·ªÅ ƒë·ªÉ kh√¥ng b·ªã d√≠nh v√†o c√°c ph·∫ßn t·ª≠ kh√°c.
    • z-index: 2;: ƒê·∫£m b·∫£o ti√™u ƒë·ªÅ s·∫Ω lu√¥n hi·ªÉn th·ªã tr√™n h√¨nh ·∫£nh n·ªÅn.

  4. Subheading (.home-subtitle):

    • z-index: 2;: ƒê·∫£m b·∫£o subtitle lu√¥n hi·ªÉn th·ªã tr√™n n·ªÅn c·ªßa ph·∫ßn h√¨nh ·∫£nh.

  5. N√∫t CTA (.btn-discover):

    • z-index: 2;: ƒê·∫£m b·∫£o n√∫t CTA lu√¥n n·ªïi b·∫≠t v√† kh√¥ng b·ªã ·∫©n d∆∞·ªõi ·∫£nh ho·∫∑c c√°c ph·∫ßn t·ª≠ kh√°c.

  6. Animation:

    • C√°c animation fade-in v√† slide-in-left s·∫Ω gi√∫p c√°c ph·∫ßn t·ª≠ nh∆∞ ti√™u ƒë·ªÅ v√† ph·ª• ƒë·ªÅ xu·∫•t hi·ªán m·ªôt c√°ch m∆∞·ª£t m√† khi ng∆∞·ªùi d√πng cu·ªôn trang xu·ªëng.

K·∫øt qu·∫£:

  • VƒÉn b·∫£n s·∫Ω r√µ r√†ng h∆°n v·ªõi n·ªÅn gradient t·ªëi h∆°n.
  • H√¨nh ·∫£nh kh√¥ng b·ªã m√©o v√† lu√¥n ph√π h·ª£p v·ªõi kh√¥ng gian.
  • C√°c ph·∫ßn t·ª≠ nh∆∞ ti√™u ƒë·ªÅ, ph·ª• ƒë·ªÅ v√† n√∫t CTA s·∫Ω kh√¥ng b·ªã ƒë√® l√™n nhau, gi√∫p trang web g·ªçn g√†ng v√† d·ªÖ nh√¨n h∆°n.
B·∫°n ƒë√£ n√≥i:

ChatGPT ƒë√£ n√≥i:

ƒê·ªÉ b·∫°n d·ªÖ hi·ªÉu h∆°n, t√¥i s·∫Ω gi·∫£i th√≠ch chi ti·∫øt t·ª´ng ph·∫ßn trong code CSS c·ªßa b·∫°n:

1. .home-section (ph·∫ßn n·ªÅn trang ch·ªß)

css
.home-section {
    height: 700px;
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    background: linear-gradient(rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5), rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5)),

    color: white;
    padding: 50px;
    background-position: center;
    background-size: cover;
    position: relative;
}

Gi·∫£i th√≠ch:

  • height: 700px;: ƒê·∫∑t chi·ªÅu cao c·ªßa ph·∫ßn n√†y l√† 700px. ƒêi·ªÅu n√†y gi√∫p ph·∫ßn trang ch·ªß c√≥ m·ªôt kh√¥ng gian l·ªõn ƒë·ªß ƒë·ªÉ ƒë·∫∑t n·ªôi dung v√† h√¨nh ·∫£nh.

  • background: linear-gradient(...): S·ª≠ d·ª•ng m·ªôt gradient (chuy·ªÉn m√†u) k·∫øt h·ª£p v·ªõi h√¨nh ·∫£nh n·ªÅn. Gradient n√†y s·∫Ω t·ªëi d·∫ßn t·ª´ tr√™n xu·ªëng d∆∞·ªõi (do rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5)), gi√∫p vƒÉn b·∫£n n·ªïi b·∫≠t h∆°n v√† d·ªÖ ƒë·ªçc h∆°n tr√™n n·ªÅn h√¨nh ·∫£nh.
  • url("../img/home/home-background.jpg") no-repeat center center/cover;: Ch√®n h√¨nh ·∫£nh n·ªÅn v√† ƒë·∫£m b·∫£o n√≥ ph·ªß k√≠n ph·∫ßn .home-section m√† kh√¥ng b·ªã l·∫∑p l·∫°i.
  • color: white;: M√†u ch·ªØ s·∫Ω l√† m√†u tr·∫Øng, gi√∫p vƒÉn b·∫£n d·ªÖ ƒë·ªçc tr√™n n·ªÅn t·ªëi.

  • height: auto;: ƒê·∫£m b·∫£o t·ª∑ l·ªá chi·ªÅu cao c·ªßa h√¨nh ·∫£nh ph√π h·ª£p v·ªõi chi·ªÅu r·ªông c·ªßa n√≥, gi·ªØ t·ª∑ l·ªá g·ªëc c·ªßa h√¨nh ·∫£nh.

  • box-shadow: 0px 8px 16px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2);: Th√™m b√≥ng ƒë·ªï cho h√¨nh ·∫£nh ƒë·ªÉ t·∫°o hi·ªáu ·ª©ng n·ªïi b·∫≠t v√† chi·ªÅu s√¢u.
  • animation: fade-in 1.5s ease-in-out;: Th√™m hi·ªáu ·ª©ng animation l√†m cho h√¨nh ·∫£nh t·ª´ t·ª´ xu·∫•t hi·ªán khi trang ƒë∆∞·ª£c t·∫£i.
  • object-fit: cover;: ƒê·∫£m b·∫£o h√¨nh ·∫£nh kh√¥ng b·ªã m√©o v√† s·∫Ω t·ª± ƒë·ªông ƒëi·ªÅu ch·ªânh ƒë·ªÉ bao ph·ªß to√†n b·ªô kh√¥ng gian c·ªßa ph·∫ßn t·ª≠ ch·ª©a n√≥.

3. .home-title (ti√™u ƒë·ªÅ)

css
.home-title {
    font-family: "Playfair Display", serif;
    font-size: 40px;
    font-weight: bold;
    animation: slide-in-left 1s ease-in-out;
    margin-bottom: 20px;
    z-index: 2;
}

Gi·∫£i th√≠ch:

  • font-family: "Playfair Display", serif;: ƒê·∫∑t font ch·ªØ cho ti√™u ƒë·ªÅ l√† "Playfair Display", m·ªôt font serif gi√∫p ti√™u ƒë·ªÅ tr√¥ng trang tr·ªçng v√† d·ªÖ ƒë·ªçc.
  • font-size: 40px;: ƒê·∫∑t k√≠ch th∆∞·ªõc ch·ªØ ti√™u ƒë·ªÅ l√† 40px, ƒë·ªß l·ªõn ƒë·ªÉ n·ªïi b·∫≠t.
  • font-weight: bold;: ƒê·∫£m b·∫£o ti√™u ƒë·ªÅ ƒë·∫≠m h∆°n, d·ªÖ nh√¨n th·∫•y.
  • animation: slide-in-left 1s ease-in-out;: Th√™m hi·ªáu ·ª©ng animation, l√†m cho ti√™u ƒë·ªÅ "l∆∞·ªõt" t·ª´ b√™n tr√°i v√†o khi trang ƒë∆∞·ª£c t·∫£i.
  • margin-bottom: 20px;: Th√™m kho·∫£ng c√°ch d∆∞·ªõi ti√™u ƒë·ªÅ ƒë·ªÉ n√≥ kh√¥ng d√≠nh v√†o c√°c ph·∫ßn t·ª≠ kh√°c nh∆∞ subtitle ho·∫∑c n√∫t CTA.
  • z-index: 2;: ƒê·∫£m b·∫£o ti√™u ƒë·ªÅ s·∫Ω lu√¥n hi·ªÉn th·ªã tr√™n c√°c ph·∫ßn t·ª≠ kh√°c, kh√¥ng b·ªã che khu·∫•t b·ªüi h√¨nh ·∫£nh n·ªÅn.

4. .home-subtitle (ph·ª• ƒë·ªÅ)

css
.home-subtitle {
    font-size: 18px;
    margin-top: 10px;
    line-height: 28px;
    animation: fade-in 1.5s ease-in-out;
    z-index: 2;
}

Gi·∫£i th√≠ch:

  • font-size: 18px;: K√≠ch th∆∞·ªõc ch·ªØ cho ph·ª• ƒë·ªÅ.
  • margin-top: 10px;: Th√™m kho·∫£ng c√°ch gi·ªØa ph·ª• ƒë·ªÅ v√† ti√™u ƒë·ªÅ.
  • line-height: 28px;: ƒê·∫£m b·∫£o kho·∫£ng c√°ch gi·ªØa c√°c d√≤ng trong ph·ª• ƒë·ªÅ ƒë∆∞·ª£c d·ªÖ ƒë·ªçc h∆°n.
  • animation: fade-in 1.5s ease-in-out;: Th√™m hi·ªáu ·ª©ng l√†m cho ph·ª• ƒë·ªÅ xu·∫•t hi·ªán t·ª´ t·ª´.
  • z-index: 2;: ƒê·∫£m b·∫£o ph·ª• ƒë·ªÅ lu√¥n hi·ªÉn th·ªã tr√™n n·ªÅn ho·∫∑c c√°c ph·∫ßn t·ª≠ kh√°c.

5. .btn-discover (n√∫t CTA - Call to Action)

css
.btn-discover {
    margin-top: 20px;
    padding: 12px 24px;
    border: 2px solid white;
    color: white;
    border-radius: 25px;
    text-decoration: none;
    transition: all 0.3s ease-in-out;
    font-weight: bold;
    display: inline-block;
    font-size: 18px;
    z-index: 2;
}

Gi·∫£i th√≠ch:

  • margin-top: 20px;: Th√™m kho·∫£ng c√°ch tr√™n n√∫t CTA ƒë·ªÉ kh√¥ng b·ªã d√≠nh v√†o ph·∫ßn t·ª≠ tr√™n.
  • padding: 12px 24px;: Th√™m kh√¥ng gian b√™n trong n√∫t ƒë·ªÉ n√≥ tr√¥ng r√µ r√†ng h∆°n.
  • border: 2px solid white;: ƒê·∫∑t vi·ªÅn c·ªßa n√∫t l√† m√†u tr·∫Øng v·ªõi ƒë·ªô d√†y 2px.
  • color: white;: M√†u ch·ªØ trong n√∫t s·∫Ω l√† m√†u tr·∫Øng.
  • border-radius: 25px;: L√†m m·ªÅm c√°c g√≥c c·ªßa n√∫t.
  • text-decoration: none;: Lo·∫°i b·ªè g·∫°ch ch√¢n kh·ªèi vƒÉn b·∫£n trong n√∫t.
  • transition: all 0.3s ease-in-out;: Th√™m hi·ªáu ·ª©ng chuy·ªÉn ti·∫øp m∆∞·ª£t m√† khi ng∆∞·ªùi d√πng hover v√†o n√∫t.
  • font-weight: bold;: L√†m cho vƒÉn b·∫£n trong n√∫t ƒë·∫≠m h∆°n.
  • display: inline-block;: ƒê·∫£m b·∫£o n√∫t ho·∫°t ƒë·ªông nh∆∞ m·ªôt ph·∫ßn t·ª≠ inline, nh∆∞ng c√≥ th·ªÉ √°p d·ª•ng chi·ªÅu r·ªông, chi·ªÅu cao v√† padding.
  • font-size: 18px;: ƒê·∫∑t k√≠ch th∆∞·ªõc ch·ªØ trong n√∫t.
  • z-index: 2;: ƒê·∫£m b·∫£o n√∫t lu√¥n hi·ªÉn th·ªã tr√™n c√°c ph·∫ßn t·ª≠ kh√°c.

6. Animation Keyframes

css
@keyframes slide-in-left {
    from {
        opacity: 0;
        transform: translateX(-30px);
    }
    to {
        opacity: 1;
        transform: translateX(0px);
    }
}

@keyframes fade-in {
    from {
        opacity: 0;
    }
    to {
        opacity: 1;
    }
}

Gi·∫£i th√≠ch:

  • @keyframes slide-in-left: T·∫°o hi·ªáu ·ª©ng l√†m cho ti√™u ƒë·ªÅ (ho·∫∑c ph·∫ßn t·ª≠ n√†o ƒë√≥) "l∆∞·ªõt" t·ª´ b√™n tr√°i v√†o. N√≥ b·∫Øt ƒë·∫ßu v·ªõi ƒë·ªô m·ªù 0 v√† di chuy·ªÉn t·ª´ -30px sang 0px (nghƒ©a l√† t·ª´ ngo√†i m√†n h√¨nh v√†o).
  • @keyframes fade-in: L√†m cho ph·∫ßn t·ª≠ d·∫ßn d·∫ßn hi·ªán ra t·ª´ ƒë·ªô m·ªù 0 ƒë·∫øn ƒë·ªô m·ªù 1.

K·∫øt lu·∫≠n:

C√°c thay ƒë·ªïi n√†y gi√∫p t·∫°o ra m·ªôt ph·∫ßn trang ch·ªß h·∫•p d·∫´n, d·ªÖ ƒë·ªçc v√† d·ªÖ nh√¨n. Ch·ªØ n·ªïi b·∫≠t, h√¨nh ·∫£nh r√µ r√†ng, v√† c√°c ph·∫ßn t·ª≠ ƒë∆∞·ª£c s·∫Øp x·∫øp h·ª£p l√Ω v·ªõi hi·ªáu ·ª©ng m∆∞·ª£t m√† khi ng∆∞·ªùi d√πng cu·ªôn trang ho·∫∑c t·∫£i trang.

B·∫°n ƒë√£ n√≥i:
t√¥i mu·ªën t√¨m c√°ch ƒë·ªÉ th√™m v√†o nhi·ªÅu h√¨nh ·∫£nh n·ªØa gi·ªëng v·ªõi h√¨nh ·∫£nh minh h·ªça v√† chuy·ªÉn ƒë·ªïi b·∫±ng n√∫t m≈©i t√™n chuy·ªÉn v√† chuy·ªÉn t·ª± ƒë·ªông sau 5s
ChatGPT ƒë√£ n√≥i:

ƒê·ªÉ t·∫°o m·ªôt carousel (tr√¨nh chi·∫øu h√¨nh ·∫£nh) cho nhi·ªÅu h√¨nh ·∫£nh v√† th√™m c√°c t√≠nh nƒÉng nh∆∞ chuy·ªÉn h√¨nh ·∫£nh b·∫±ng n√∫t m≈©i t√™n v√† t·ª± ƒë·ªông chuy·ªÉn sau m·ªói 5 gi√¢y, b·∫°n c√≥ th·ªÉ s·ª≠ d·ª•ng HTML, CSS v√† JavaScript. D∆∞·ªõi ƒë√¢y l√† c√°ch th·ª±c hi·ªán:

1. HTML: T·∫°o c·∫•u tr√∫c c∆° b·∫£n c·ªßa carousel

html
<section class="carousel-container">
  <div class="carousel">
    <img src="img1.jpg" alt="Image 1" class="carousel-image">
    <img src="img2.jpg" alt="Image 2" class="carousel-image">
    <img src="img3.jpg" alt="Image 3" class="carousel-image">
    <!-- Th√™m nhi·ªÅu h√¨nh ·∫£nh kh√°c n·∫øu c·∫ßn -->
  </div>

  <!-- N√∫t m≈©i t√™n chuy·ªÉn ti·∫øp -->
  <button class="carousel-btn prev" onclick="moveSlide(-1)">&#10094;</button>
  <button class="carousel-btn next" onclick="moveSlide(1)">&#10095;</button>
</section>

2. CSS: ƒê·ªãnh d·∫°ng v√† th√™m hi·ªáu ·ª©ng cho carousel

css
.carousel-container {
  position: relative;
  width: 100%;
  max-width: 1000px;
  margin: 0 auto;
  overflow: hidden;
}

.carousel {
  display: flex;
  transition: transform 0.5s ease-in-out;
}

.carousel-image {
  width: 100%;
  height: 500px;  /* ƒêi·ªÅu ch·ªânh theo k√≠ch th∆∞·ªõc h√¨nh ·∫£nh */
  object-fit: cover;
  border-radius: 15px;
}

.carousel-btn {
  position: absolute;
  top: 50%;
  transform: translateY(-50%);
  background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5);
  color: white;
  border: none;
  padding: 10px;
  cursor: pointer;
  font-size: 20px;
  z-index: 2;
}

.carousel-btn.prev {
  left: 10px;
}

.carousel-btn.next {
  right: 10px;
}

.carousel-btn:hover {
  background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8);
}

3. JavaScript: Th√™m ch·ª©c nƒÉng chuy·ªÉn h√¨nh ·∫£nh t·ª± ƒë·ªông v√† chuy·ªÉn qua l·∫°i v·ªõi n√∫t m≈©i t√™n

javascript
let currentIndex = 0;
const images = document.querySelectorAll(".carousel-image");
const totalImages = images.length;

function moveSlide(step) {
  currentIndex += step;
  if (currentIndex < 0) {
    currentIndex = totalImages - 1; // Quay l·∫°i h√¨nh ·∫£nh cu·ªëi
  } else if (currentIndex >= totalImages) {
    currentIndex = 0; // Quay l·∫°i h√¨nh ·∫£nh ƒë·∫ßu
  }
  updateCarousel();
}

function updateCarousel() {
  const offset = -currentIndex * 100; // Di chuy·ªÉn c√°c h√¨nh ·∫£nh theo chi·ªÅu ngang
  document.querySelector(".carousel").style.transform = `translateX(${offset}%)`;
}

// T·ª± ƒë·ªông chuy·ªÉn h√¨nh ·∫£nh m·ªói 5 gi√¢y
setInterval(() => {
  moveSlide(1); // T·ª± ƒë·ªông chuy·ªÉn sang h√¨nh ·∫£nh ti·∫øp theo
}, 5000); // 5 gi√¢y

// Kh·ªüi t·∫°o hi·ªÉn th·ªã carousel ban ƒë·∫ßu
updateCarousel();

Gi·∫£i th√≠ch:

  1. HTML:

    • Ph·∫ßn t·ª≠ .carousel-container bao quanh t·∫•t c·∫£ c√°c h√¨nh ·∫£nh v√† n√∫t m≈©i t√™n.
    • C√°c h√¨nh ·∫£nh ƒë∆∞·ª£c x·∫øp trong m·ªôt ph·∫ßn t·ª≠ .carousel v·ªõi class .carousel-image ƒë·ªÉ d·ªÖ d√†ng x·ª≠ l√Ω v√† thay ƒë·ªïi.
    • C√°c n√∫t m≈©i t√™n s·ª≠ d·ª•ng k√Ω hi·ªáu HTML &#10094; (m≈©i t√™n tr√°i) v√† &#10095; (m≈©i t√™n ph·∫£i).

  2. CSS:

    • .carousel-container: ƒê·∫£m b·∫£o carousel kh√¥ng b·ªã tr√†n ra ngo√†i m√†n h√¨nh v√† h√¨nh ·∫£nh s·∫Ω hi·ªÉn th·ªã ƒë·∫ßy ƒë·ªß v·ªõi overflow: hidden;.
    • .carousel: S·ª≠ d·ª•ng display: flex ƒë·ªÉ c√°c h√¨nh ·∫£nh n·∫±m theo chi·ªÅu ngang. Khi thay ƒë·ªïi transform: translateX(), s·∫Ω t·∫°o hi·ªáu ·ª©ng tr∆∞·ª£t qua l·∫°i.
    • .carousel-btn: C√°c n√∫t m≈©i t√™n ƒë∆∞·ª£c ƒë·∫∑t ·ªü v·ªã tr√≠ tuy·ªát ƒë·ªëi (absolute) v·ªõi c√°c thu·ªôc t√≠nh top, left, v√† right ƒë·ªÉ cƒÉn ch·ªânh ƒë√∫ng v√†o v·ªã tr√≠ c·∫ßn thi·∫øt.

  3. JavaScript:

    • moveSlide(step): H√†m n√†y nh·∫≠n tham s·ªë step (c√≥ th·ªÉ l√† 1 ho·∫∑c -1) ƒë·ªÉ thay ƒë·ªïi currentIndex v√† c·∫≠p nh·∫≠t l·∫°i carousel.
    • updateCarousel(): H√†m n√†y s·∫Ω c·∫≠p nh·∫≠t v·ªã tr√≠ c·ªßa ph·∫ßn t·ª≠ .carousel d·ª±a tr√™n currentIndex ƒë·ªÉ hi·ªÉn th·ªã h√¨nh ·∫£nh ph√π h·ª£p.
    • setInterval: H√†m n√†y gi√∫p chuy·ªÉn h√¨nh ·∫£nh t·ª± ƒë·ªông sau m·ªói 5 gi√¢y (5000ms).

4. C·∫£i thi·ªán hi·ªáu ·ª©ng chuy·ªÉn ƒë·ªông:

B·∫°n c√≥ th·ªÉ thay ƒë·ªïi c√°c hi·ªáu ·ª©ng b·∫±ng c√°ch ƒëi·ªÅu ch·ªânh thu·ªôc t√≠nh transition ho·∫∑c th√™m c√°c animation kh√°c ƒë·ªÉ l√†m cho chuy·ªÉn ƒë·ªông m∆∞·ª£t m√† h∆°n. V√≠ d·ª•, b·∫°n c√≥ th·ªÉ thay ƒë·ªïi transition: transform 0.5s ease-in-out th√†nh c√°c gi√° tr·ªã kh√°c nhau ƒë·ªÉ l√†m cho chuy·ªÉn ƒë·ªông tr∆°n tru h∆°n.

V·ªõi c√°ch n√†y, b·∫°n c√≥ th·ªÉ d·ªÖ d√†ng t·∫°o carousel cho nhi·ªÅu h√¨nh ·∫£nh v√† ƒëi·ªÅu khi·ªÉn ch√∫ng b·∫±ng c√°c n√∫t m≈©i t√™n ho·∫∑c t·ª± ƒë·ªông chuy·ªÉn theo th·ªùi gian.

B·∫°n ƒë√£ n√≥i:
ti·∫øp theo l√† ph·∫ßn d·ªãch v·ª•
ChatGPT ƒë√£ n√≥i:

D∆∞·ªõi ƒë√¢y l√† ph·∫ßn D·ªãch v·ª• v·ªõi thi·∫øt k·∫ø chuy√™n nghi·ªáp, c√≥ hi·ªáu ·ª©ng animation ƒë∆°n gi·∫£n nh∆∞ng hi·ªáu qu·∫£.

üîπ √ù t∆∞·ªüng thi·∫øt k·∫ø:

  • B·ªë c·ª•c: 3-4 th·∫ª d·ªãch v·ª• hi·ªÉn th·ªã d·∫°ng l∆∞·ªõi.
  • Hi·ªáu ·ª©ng: Hover (l∆∞·ªõt chu·ªôt) s·∫Ω l√†m th·∫ª d·ªãch v·ª• ph√≥ng to nh·∫π v√† thay ƒë·ªïi m√†u s·∫Øc.
  • Animation: D√πng hi·ªáu ·ª©ng xu·∫•t hi·ªán d·∫ßn (fade-in) khi cu·ªôn xu·ªëng.

1Ô∏è‚É£ HTML: C·∫•u tr√∫c ph·∫ßn D·ªãch v·ª•

html
<section class="services-section">
  <h2 class="section-title">D·ªãch V·ª• C·ªßa Ch√∫ng T√¥i</h2>
  <p class="section-subtitle">Ch√∫ng t√¥i cung c·∫•p c√°c d·ªãch v·ª• ch·∫•t l∆∞·ª£ng cao v·ªõi s·ª± t·∫≠n t√¢m.</p>

  <div class="services-container">
    <div class="service-card">
      <img src="img/service1.jpg" alt="D·ªãch v·ª• 1">
      <h3>Thi·∫øt k·∫ø ƒë·ªì h·ªça</h3>

    </div>

    <div class="service-card">
      <img src="img/service3.jpg" alt="D·ªãch v·ª• 3">

    </div>

  </div>
</section>

2Ô∏è‚É£ CSS: Hi·ªáu ·ª©ng & Giao di·ªán

css
/* Ph·∫ßn t·ªïng th·ªÉ */
.services-section {
  text-align: center;
  padding: 50px;
  background: linear-gradient(to right, #f8f9fa, #e9ecef);
}

.section-title {
  font-size: 36px;
  font-family: "Playfair Display", serif;
  font-weight: bold;
  color: #333;
  margin-bottom: 10px;
}

.section-subtitle {
  font-size: 18px;
  color: #666;
  margin-bottom: 30px;
}

/* Container ch·ª©a c√°c d·ªãch v·ª• */
.services-container {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(250px, 1fr));
  gap: 20px;
  justify-content: center;
  padding: 20px;
}

/* Th·∫ª d·ªãch v·ª• */
.service-card {
  background: white;
  padding: 20px;
  border-radius: 15px;
  box-shadow: 0px 5px 15px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
  transition: transform 0.3s ease-in-out, box-shadow 0.3s ease-in-out;
  text-align: center;
  overflow: hidden;
  position: relative;
  animation: fade-in 1s ease-in-out;
}

.service-card img {
  width: 100%;
  height: 180px;
  object-fit: cover;
  border-radius: 10px;
}

.service-card h3 {
  font-size: 22px;
  color: #333;
  margin-top: 15px;
}

.service-card p {
  font-size: 16px;
  color: #666;
  margin-top: 10px;
}

/* Hi·ªáu ·ª©ng hover */
.service-card:hover {
  transform: scale(1.05);
  box-shadow: 0px 10px 20px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2);
}

/* Hi·ªáu ·ª©ng xu·∫•t hi·ªán */
@keyframes fade-in {
  from {
    opacity: 0;
    transform: translateY(20px);
  }
  to {
    opacity: 1;
    transform: translateY(0);
  }
}

3Ô∏è‚É£ Gi·∫£i th√≠ch Code

‚úÖ HTML:

  • <h2> v√† <p>: Ti√™u ƒë·ªÅ v√† m√¥ t·∫£ chung c·ªßa ph·∫ßn d·ªãch v·ª•.
  • <div class="services-container">: Ch·ª©a to√†n b·ªô c√°c d·ªãch v·ª•.
  • <div class="service-card">: T·ª´ng th·∫ª d·ªãch v·ª• ri√™ng l·∫ª c√≥ ·∫£nh, ti√™u ƒë·ªÅ, m√¥ t·∫£.

‚úÖ CSS:

  • M√†u s·∫Øc n·ªÅn: D√πng linear-gradient(to right, #f8f9fa, #e9ecef); t·∫°o c·∫£m gi√°c sang tr·ªçng.
  • Giao di·ªán th·∫ª d·ªãch v·ª•:
    • box-shadow gi√∫p t·∫°o hi·ªáu ·ª©ng n·ªïi kh·ªëi nh·∫π.
    • border-radius: 15px; l√†m bo g√≥c m·ªÅm m·∫°i.
    • transition: transform 0.3s ease-in-out; gi√∫p hi·ªáu ·ª©ng hover m∆∞·ª£t h∆°n.
  • Hover hi·ªáu ·ª©ng:
    • transform: scale(1.05); gi√∫p th·∫ª d·ªãch v·ª• ph√≥ng to nh·∫π khi l∆∞·ªõt chu·ªôt.
    • box-shadow ƒë·∫≠m h∆°n t·∫°o c·∫£m gi√°c "nh·∫•n m·∫°nh".
  • Animation xu·∫•t hi·ªán (fade-in):
    • L√∫c t·∫£i trang, c√°c th·∫ª d·ªãch v·ª• s·∫Ω xu·∫•t hi·ªán d·∫ßn t·ª´ d∆∞·ªõi l√™n v·ªõi hi·ªáu ·ª©ng m∆∞·ª£t.

4Ô∏è‚É£ T√≠nh nƒÉng m·ªü r·ªông

B·∫°n c√≥ th·ªÉ th√™m m·ªôt n√∫t "Xem th√™m" ƒë·ªÉ d·∫´n ƒë·∫øn trang chi ti·∫øt v·ªÅ d·ªãch v·ª•:

html
<a href="services.html" class="btn-more">Xem th√™m</a>

css
.btn-more {
  display: inline-block;
  margin-top: 20px;
  padding: 12px 24px;
  background-color: #333;
  color: white;
  text-decoration: none;
  border-radius: 25px;
  transition: background-color 0.3s;
}

.btn-more:hover {
  background-color: #556b2f;
}

üìå T√≥m t·∫Øt:

‚úî Giao di·ªán chuy√™n nghi·ªáp, m√†u s·∫Øc nh·∫π nh√†ng nh∆∞ng n·ªïi b·∫≠t.
‚úî Hover hi·ªáu ·ª©ng ƒë·∫πp, th·∫ª d·ªãch v·ª• ph√≥ng to nh·∫π khi r√™ chu·ªôt.
‚úî Animation xu·∫•t hi·ªán d·∫ßn, gi√∫p ph·∫ßn D·ªãch v·ª• sinh ƒë·ªông h∆°n.
‚úî D·ªÖ m·ªü r·ªông, c√≥ th·ªÉ th√™m nhi·ªÅu d·ªãch v·ª• m√† kh√¥ng ·∫£nh h∆∞·ªüng layout.

üí° B·∫°n c√≥ mu·ªën th√™m hi·ªáu ·ª©ng n√†o kh√°c kh√¥ng? üöÄ

  padding: 60px 20px;
  background: linear-gradient(to right, #f8f9fa, #e9ecef);
}

/* Ti√™u ƒë·ªÅ ch√≠nh */
.section-title {
  font-size: 36px;
  font-family: "Playfair Display", serif;
  font-weight: bold;
  color: #333;
  margin-bottom: 10px;
}

.section-subtitle {
  font-size: 18px;
  color: #666;
  margin-bottom: 30px;
}

/* Container d·ªãch v·ª• */
.service-card {
  background: white;
  padding: 20px;
  border-radius: 15px;
  box-shadow: 0px 5px 15px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
  transition: transform 0.3s ease-in-out, box-shadow 0.3s ease-in-out;
  text-align: center;
  overflow: hidden;
  position: relative;
  animation: fade-in 1s ease-in-out;
}

.service-card img {
  width: 100%;
  height: 200px;
  object-fit: cover;
  border-radius: 10px;
}

.service-card h3 {
  font-size: 22px;
  color: #333;
  margin-top: 15px;
}

.service-card p {
  font-size: 16px;
  color: #666;
  margin-top: 10px;
}

/* Hover hi·ªáu ·ª©ng */
.service-card:hover {
  transform: scale(1.05);
  box-shadow: 0px 10px 20px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2);
}

/* Animation xu·∫•t hi·ªán */
@keyframes fade-in {
  from {
    opacity: 0;
    transform: translateY(20px);
  }
  to {
    opacity: 1;
    transform: translateY(0);
  }
}

/* N√∫t li√™n h·ªá */
.btn-more {
  display: inline-block;
  margin-top: 20px;
  padding: 12px 24px;
  background-color: #333;
  color: white;
  text-decoration: none;
  border-radius: 25px;
  transition: background-color 0.3s;
}

.btn-more:hover {
  background-color: #556b2f;
}

üìå CSS (Th√™m v√†o blog.css)

üé® Code CSS (blog.css)

css
.blog-section {
    padding: 80px 20px;
    background-color: #f9f9f9;
    text-align: center;
}

/* Ti√™u ƒë·ªÅ */
.section-title {
    font-size: 36px;
    font-family: "Playfair Display", serif;
    font-weight: bold;
    color: #333;
    animation: fade-in 1.5s ease-in-out;
}

.section-subtitle {
    font-size: 18px;
    margin-bottom: 30px;
    color: #777;
    animation: fade-in 1.5s ease-in-out;
}

/* Layout Blog */
.blog-grid {
    display: grid;
    grid-template-columns: repeat(4, 1fr);
    gap: 20px;
}

/* Th·∫ª Blog */
.blog-card {
    background: white;
    border-radius: 12px;
    overflow: hidden;
    box-shadow: 0px 8px 16px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
    transition: transform 0.3s ease-in-out;
    animation: slide-in-up 1s ease-in-out;
}

.blog-card:hover {
    transform: translateY(-10px);
}

/* H√¨nh ·∫£nh */
.blog-image {
    width: 100%;
    height: 200px;
    object-fit: cover;
}

/* N·ªôi dung */
.blog-content {
    padding: 15px;
    text-align: left;
}

.blog-title {
    font-size: 20px;
    font-weight: bold;
    color: #222;
    margin-bottom: 10px;
}

.blog-excerpt {
    font-size: 16px;
    color: #666;
    margin-bottom: 15px;
}

/* N√∫t Xem Th√™m */
.btn-read-more {
    display: inline-block;
    padding: 8px 16px;
    font-size: 16px;
    font-weight: bold;
    color: #333;
    text-decoration: none;
    border-bottom: 2px solid #333;
    transition: color 0.3s, border-color 0.3s;
}

.btn-read-more:hover {
    color: #556b2f;
    border-color: #556b2f;
}

/* Animations */
@keyframes fade-in {
    from {
        opacity: 0;
    }
    to {
        opacity: 1;
    }
}

@keyframes slide-in-up {
    from {
        opacity: 0;
        transform: translateY(20px);
    }
    to {
        opacity: 1;
        transform: translateY(0);
    }
}

üìå ƒêi·ªÉm n·ªïi b·∫≠t

‚úÖ Giao di·ªán tinh t·∫ø, t·ªëi gi·∫£n, d·ªÖ nh√¨n

üé® C·∫≠p nh·∫≠t CSS (blog.css)

css
.blog-card {
    background: white;
    border-radius: 12px;
    overflow: hidden;
    box-shadow: 0px 8px 16px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
    transition: transform 0.5s ease-in-out, box-shadow 0.5s ease-in-out;
    animation: slide-in-up 1s ease-in-out;
}

/* Hi·ªáu ·ª©ng "t·∫°p ch√≠" khi hover */
.blog-card:hover {
    transform: scale(1.05) rotateX(10deg) rotateY(5deg);
    box-shadow: 0px 12px 24px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2);
}

/* Animations */
@keyframes fade-in {
    from {
        opacity: 0;
    }
    to {
        opacity: 1;
    }
}

@keyframes slide-in-up {
    from {
        opacity: 0;
        transform: translateY(20px);
    }
    to {
        opacity: 1;
        transform: translateY(0);
    }
}

üìå ƒêi·ªÉm n·ªïi b·∫≠t c·ªßa hi·ªáu ·ª©ng

‚úÖ M√¥ ph·ªèng c·∫£m gi√°c l·∫≠t trang nh·∫π khi hover v√†o b√†i vi·∫øt.
‚úÖ T·∫°o chi·ªÅu s√¢u v·ªõi hi·ªáu ·ª©ng 3D xoay nh·∫π (rotateX(10deg) rotateY(5deg)).
‚úÖ Hi·ªáu ·ª©ng m∆∞·ª£t m√†, kh√¥ng l√†m r·ªëi m·∫Øt.
‚úÖ Kh√¥ng ·∫£nh h∆∞·ªüng b·ªë c·ª•c g·ªëc, ch·ªâ l√†m n·ªïi b·∫≠t t·ª´ng b√†i vi·∫øt ri√™ng l·∫ª.

B·∫°n mu·ªën tƒÉng th√™m hi·ªáu ·ª©ng n√†o n·ªØa kh√¥ng? üöÄ

ChatGPT ƒë√£ n√≥i:

D∆∞·ªõi ƒë√¢y l√† m·ªôt b·ªë c·ª•c Blog h√†i h√≤a h∆°n, mang phong c√°ch t·∫°p ch√≠ hi·ªán ƒë·∫°i, d·ªÖ ƒë·ªçc v√† v·∫´n gi·ªØ ƒë∆∞·ª£c hi·ªáu ·ª©ng animation l·∫≠t trang nh·∫π khi hover.

üìå B·ªë c·ª•c m·ªõi:

üîπ B√†i vi·∫øt ch√≠nh (chi·∫øm 50% chi·ªÅu r·ªông, n·ªïi b·∫≠t nh·∫•t).
üîπ Ba b√†i vi·∫øt ph·ª• (chi·∫øm 25% chi·ªÅu r·ªông, ƒë·∫∑t k·∫ø b√™n b√†i ch√≠nh).
üîπ Hi·ªáu ·ª©ng m∆∞·ª£t m√† khi hover, t·∫°o c·∫£m gi√°c l·∫≠t trang nh·∫π.

üìú Code HTML

html
