    <h2 class="section-title">T·∫°p Ch√≠ Ki·∫øn Tr√∫c</h2>
    <div class="blog-grid">
      <!-- B√†i vi·∫øt ch√≠nh -->
      <div class="blog-card main-post">
        <img src="img/blog/main-post.jpg" alt="B√†i vi·∫øt ch√≠nh" class="blog-image">
        <div class="blog-content">
          <h3 class="blog-title">Ngh·ªá Thu·∫≠t Ki·∫øn Tr√∫c ƒê∆∞∆°ng ƒê·∫°i</h3>
          <p class="blog-description">Kh√°m ph√° nh·ªØng xu h∆∞·ªõng ki·∫øn tr√∫c m·ªõi nh·∫•t ƒëang ƒë·ªãnh h√¨nh kh√¥ng gian s·ªëng hi·ªán ƒë·∫°i.</p>
          <a href="#" class="read-more">ƒê·ªçc th√™m ‚Üí</a>
        </div>
      </div>

      <!-- Ba b√†i vi·∫øt ph·ª• -->
      <div class="blog-card sub-post">
        <img src="img/blog/post1.jpg" alt="B√†i vi·∫øt 1" class="blog-image">
        <div class="blog-content">
          <h4 class="blog-title">Thi·∫øt K·∫ø Kh√¥ng Gian Xanh</h4>
          <p class="blog-description">L√†m th·∫ø n√†o ƒë·ªÉ ƒë∆∞a thi√™n nhi√™n v√†o trong nh√†?</p>
          <a href="#" class="read-more">ƒê·ªçc th√™m ‚Üí</a>
        </div>
      </div>

      <div class="blog-card sub-post">
        <img src="img/blog/post2.jpg" alt="B√†i vi·∫øt 2" class="blog-image">
        <div class="blog-content">
          <h4 class="blog-title">V·∫≠t Li·ªáu X√¢y D·ª±ng Th√¢n Thi·ªán</h4>
          <p class="blog-description">T√¨m hi·ªÉu v·ªÅ nh·ªØng lo·∫°i v·∫≠t li·ªáu gi√∫p b·∫£o v·ªá m√¥i tr∆∞·ªùng.</p>

        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>
</section>

üé® Code CSS (blog.css)

css
.blog-section {
    padding: 60px 0;
    background-color: #f8f8f8;
    text-align: center;
}

/* Ti√™u ƒë·ªÅ */
.section-title {
    font-size: 36px;
    font-family: "Playfair Display", serif;
    margin-bottom: 30px;
}

/* B·ªë c·ª•c blog */
.blog-grid {
    display: grid;
    grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr;
    gap: 20px;
    max-width: 1000px;
    margin: auto;
}

/* B√†i vi·∫øt ch√≠nh */
.main-post {
    grid-column: span 2;
    display: flex;
    flex-direction: row;
    height: 350px;
}

/* B√†i vi·∫øt ph·ª• */
.sub-post {
    height: 250px;
}

/* Card chung */
.blog-card {
    background: white;
    border-radius: 12px;
    overflow: hidden;
    box-shadow: 0px 8px 16px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
    transition: transform 0.5s ease-in-out, box-shadow 0.5s ease-in-out;
}

/* Hi·ªáu ·ª©ng "l·∫≠t trang" */
.blog-card:hover {
    transform: scale(1.05) rotateX(10deg) rotateY(5deg);
    box-shadow: 0px 12px 24px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2);
}

/* H√¨nh ·∫£nh */
.blog-image {
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    object-fit: cover;
}

/* N·ªôi dung */
.blog-content {
    padding: 20px;
    text-align: left;
}

.blog-title {
    font-size: 22px;
    font-weight: bold;
    margin-bottom: 10px;
}

.blog-description {
    font-size: 16px;
    color: #555;
    margin-bottom: 10px;
}

.read-more {
    text-decoration: none;
    color: #007bff;
    font-weight: bold;
    transition: color 0.3s ease-in-out;
}

.read-more:hover {
    color: #0056b3;
}

üìå ƒêi·ªÉm N·ªïi B·∫≠t C·ªßa B·ªë C·ª•c N√†y

‚úÖ Hi·ªÉn th·ªã d·∫°ng t·∫°p ch√≠, v·ªõi b√†i vi·∫øt ch√≠nh n·ªïi b·∫≠t.
‚úÖ Hi·ªáu ·ª©ng "l·∫≠t trang" khi hover, gi√∫p n·ªôi dung sinh ƒë·ªông h∆°n.
‚úÖ B√†i vi·∫øt ph·ª• hi·ªÉn th·ªã r√µ r√†ng, t·∫°o b·ªë c·ª•c c√¢n ƒë·ªëi.
‚úÖ D·ªÖ m·ªü r·ªông th√™m b√†i vi·∫øt n·∫øu c·∫ßn.

B·∫°n th·∫•y th·∫ø n√†o? C·∫ßn ch·ªânh s·ª≠a g√¨ th√™m kh√¥ng? üöÄ

B·∫°n ƒë√£ n√≥i:
<section id="blog" class="blog-section"> <div class="container"> <h2 class="blog-title">Kh√°m Ph√° Ki·∫øn Th·ª©c M·ªõi</h2> <!-- B√†i vi·∫øt n·ªïi b·∫≠t --> <div class="featured-post"> <img src="img/project/blog/highlight.jpg" alt="B√†i vi·∫øt n·ªïi b·∫≠t" class="featured-image"> <div class="featured-content"> <h3>B√≠ Quy·∫øt Thi·∫øt K·∫ø Kh√¥ng Gian ƒê·∫≥ng C·∫•p</h3> <p>H√£y c√πng kh√°m ph√° nh·ªØng xu h∆∞·ªõng thi·∫øt k·∫ø n·ªôi th·∫•t sang tr·ªçng nh·∫•t nƒÉm nay.</p> <a href="#" class="btn-read-more">ƒê·ªçc Th√™m</a> </div> </div> <!-- C√°c b√†i vi·∫øt ph·ª• --> <div class="blog-grid"> <!-- b√†i vi·∫øt ph·ª• 1 --> <div class="blog-item"> <img src="img/project/blog/blog1.jpg" alt="Blog 1"> <h4>Phong C√°ch T·ªëi Gi·∫£n ‚Äì S·ª± Tinh T·∫ø T·ª´ ƒê∆°n Gi·∫£n</h4> <p>Minimalism gi√∫p t·ªëi ∆∞u kh√¥ng gian s·ªëng v√† mang l·∫°i c·∫£m gi√°c tho·∫£i m√°i.</p> </div> <!-- b√†i vi·∫øt ph·ª• 2 --> <div class="blog-item"> <img src="img/project/blog/blog2.jpg" alt="Blog 2"> <h4>·ª®ng D·ª•ng C√¥ng Ngh·ªá AI Trong Thi·∫øt K·∫ø</h4> <p>Tr√≠ tu·ªá nh√¢n t·∫°o ƒëang thay ƒë·ªïi c√°ch ch√∫ng ta thi·∫øt k·∫ø v√† s√°ng t·∫°o.</p> </div> <!-- b√†i vi·∫øt ph·ª• 3 --> <div class="blog-item"> <img src="img/project/blog/blog3.jpg" alt="Blog 3"> <h4>Thi·∫øt K·∫ø B·ªÅn V·ªØng ‚Äì Xu H∆∞·ªõng C·ªßa T∆∞∆°ng Lai</h4> <p>Gi·∫£i ph√°p v·∫≠t li·ªáu th√¢n thi·ªán v·ªõi m√¥i tr∆∞·ªùng ng√†y c√†ng ƒë∆∞·ª£c ∆∞a chu·ªông.</p> </div> <!-- b√†i vi·∫øt ph·ª• 4 --> <div class="blog-item"> <img src="img/project/blog/blog4.jpg" alt="Blog 4"> <h4>M·∫πo B·ªë Tr√≠ √Ånh S√°ng Cho Kh√¥ng Gian Ho√†n H·∫£o</h4> <p>C√°ch l·ª±a ch·ªçn ƒë√®n v√† ph·ªëi √°nh s√°ng ƒë·ªÉ t·∫°o n√™n s·ª± sang tr·ªçng.</p> </div> </div> </div> </section> ( ƒëay l√† code c≈© h√£y d·ªìng b·ªô l·∫°i ƒë·ªãa ch·ªâ ·∫£nh ƒëi)
ChatGPT ƒë√£ n√≥i:

D∆∞·ªõi ƒë√¢y l√† phi√™n b·∫£n ƒë·ªìng b·ªô l·∫°i ƒë∆∞·ªùng d·∫´n ·∫£nh, gi·ªØ nguy√™n c·∫•u tr√∫c b√†i vi·∫øt nh∆∞ng ƒë·∫£m b·∫£o h√¨nh ·∫£nh ƒë·ªìng nh·∫•t v·ªõi th∆∞ m·ª•c m·ªõi nh·∫•t m√† b·∫°n ƒëang s·ª≠ d·ª•ng.

üé® C·∫≠p nh·∫≠t CSS (blog.css)

css
.blog-section {
    padding: 60px 0;
    background-color: #f8f8f8;
    text-align: center;
}

/* Ti√™u ƒë·ªÅ */
.blog-title {
    font-size: 36px;
    font-family: "Playfair Display", serif;
    margin-bottom: 30px;
}

/* B√†i vi·∫øt n·ªïi b·∫≠t */
.featured-post {
    position: relative;
    width: 100%;
    max-width: 900px;
    margin: auto;
    border-radius: 12px;
    overflow: hidden;
    box-shadow: 0px 8px 16px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
    transition: transform 0.5s ease-in-out;
}

.featured-image {
    width: 100%;
    height: auto;
    object-fit: cover;
}

.featured-content {
    padding: 20px;
    background: white;
}

.featured-post:hover {
    transform: scale(1.05);
}

/* L∆∞·ªõi blog */
.blog-grid {
    display: grid;
    grid-template-columns: repeat(2, 1fr);
    gap: 20px;
    max-width: 900px;
    margin: 30px auto 0;
}

/* Blog item */
.blog-item {
    background: white;
    border-radius: 12px;
    overflow: hidden;
    box-shadow: 0px 8px 16px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
    transition: transform 0.3s ease-in-out;
}

.blog-item:hover {
    transform: scale(1.05);
}

.blog-item img {
    width: 100%;
    height: 200px;
    object-fit: cover;
}

.blog-item h4 {
    font-size: 18px;
    margin: 10px 0;
    padding: 0 10px;
}

.blog-item p {
    font-size: 14px;
    color: #666;
    padding: 0 10px 10px;
}

/* N√∫t ƒë·ªçc th√™m */
.btn-read-more {
    display: inline-block;
    margin-top: 10px;
    padding: 8px 16px;
    background: #007bff;
    color: white;
    text-decoration: none;
    border-radius: 5px;
    transition: background 0.3s ease-in-out;
}

.btn-read-more:hover {
    background: #0056b3;
}

üìå Nh·ªØng C·∫£i Ti·∫øn Trong Phi√™n B·∫£n N√†y:

‚úÖ ƒê·ªìng b·ªô l·∫°i ƒë∆∞·ªùng d·∫´n ·∫£nh: Thay ƒë·ªïi ƒë∆∞·ªùng d·∫´n t·ª´ img/project/blog/ th√†nh img/blog/.
‚úÖ C·∫£i thi·ªán b·ªë c·ª•c: S·ª≠ d·ª•ng grid gi√∫p c√¢n ƒë·ªëi b√†i vi·∫øt ch√≠nh & ph·ª•.
‚úÖ Hi·ªáu ·ª©ng sinh ƒë·ªông: B√†i vi·∫øt ch√≠nh c√≥ hi·ªáu ·ª©ng ph√≥ng to nh·∫π khi hover.
‚úÖ TƒÉng ƒë·ªô t∆∞∆°ng th√≠ch: D·ªÖ m·ªü r·ªông s·ªë l∆∞·ª£ng b√†i vi·∫øt n·∫øu c·∫ßn.

B·∫°n c·∫ßn ch·ªânh s·ª≠a g√¨ th√™m kh√¥ng? üöÄ

B·∫°n ƒë√£ n√≥i:
√Ω t√¥i l√† ƒë·ªìng b·ªô code m·ªõi b·∫±ng nh·ªØng th√¥ng tin ri√™ng trong code c≈© ch·ª© b·ªë c·ª•c c·∫ßn t·∫°o l·∫°i nh∆∞ code m·ªõi
ChatGPT ƒë√£ n√≥i:

D∆∞·ªõi ƒë√¢y l√† b·ªë c·ª•c blog m·ªõi, ƒë∆∞·ª£c ƒë·ªìng b·ªô h√≥a v·ªõi c√°c th√¥ng tin t·ª´ code c≈© (bao g·ªìm ƒë∆∞·ªùng d·∫´n ·∫£nh, n·ªôi dung b√†i vi·∫øt, v.v.), nh∆∞ng v·∫´n gi·ªØ b·ªë c·ª•c hi·ªán ƒë·∫°i t·ª´ thi·∫øt k·∫ø m·ªõi m√† b·∫°n y√™u c·∫ßu.

üìú C·∫≠p nh·∫≠t HTML (blog-section)

html

    <div class="container">
        <h2 class="blog-title">Kh√°m Ph√° Ki·∫øn Th·ª©c M·ªõi</h2>

        <!-- B√†i vi·∫øt n·ªïi b·∫≠t -->
        <div class="blog-featured">
            <img src="img/blog/highlight.jpg" alt="B√†i vi·∫øt n·ªïi b·∫≠t" class="blog-featured-image">

üé® C·∫≠p nh·∫≠t CSS (blog.css)

css
.blog-section {
    padding: 60px 0;
    background-color: #f8f8f8;
    text-align: center;
}

/* Ti√™u ƒë·ªÅ */
.blog-title {
    font-size: 36px;
    font-family: "Playfair Display", serif;
    margin-bottom: 40px;
}

/* B√†i vi·∫øt n·ªïi b·∫≠t */
.blog-featured {
    position: relative;
    width: 100%;
    max-width: 900px;
    margin: auto;
    border-radius: 12px;
    overflow: hidden;
    box-shadow: 0px 10px 20px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
    transition: transform 0.5s ease-in-out;
}

.blog-featured-image {
    width: 100%;
    height: auto;
    object-fit: cover;
}

.blog-featured-content {
    padding: 20px;
    background: white;
}

.blog-featured:hover {
    transform: scale(1.05);
}

/* Danh s√°ch b√†i vi·∫øt */
.blog-list {
    display: flex;
    flex-wrap: wrap;
    justify-content: center;
    gap: 20px;
    margin-top: 30px;
}

/* Blog card */
.blog-card {
    background: white;
    border-radius: 12px;
    overflow: hidden;
    width: calc(50% - 10px);
    max-width: 400px;
    box-shadow: 0px 8px 16px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
    transition: transform 0.3s ease-in-out;
}

.blog-card:hover {
    transform: scale(1.05);
}

.blog-card img {
    width: 100%;
    height: 200px;
    object-fit: cover;
}

.blog-card-content {
    padding: 15px;
}

.blog-card-content h4 {
    font-size: 18px;
    margin-bottom: 10px;
}

.blog-card-content p {
    font-size: 14px;
    color: #666;
}

/* N√∫t ƒë·ªçc th√™m */
.btn-read-more {
    display: inline-block;
    margin-top: 10px;
    padding: 8px 16px;
    background: #007bff;
    color: white;
    text-decoration: none;
    border-radius: 5px;
    transition: background 0.3s ease-in-out;
}

.btn-read-more:hover {
    background: #0056b3;
}

üìå ƒêi·ªÉm M·ªõi & C·∫£i Ti·∫øn:

‚úÖ ƒê·ªìng b·ªô th√¥ng tin t·ª´ code c≈© (ti√™u ƒë·ªÅ, m√¥ t·∫£, ƒë∆∞·ªùng d·∫´n ·∫£nh).
‚úÖ Thi·∫øt k·∫ø h√†i h√≤a h∆°n: B·ªë c·ª•c g·ªçn g√†ng, b√†i vi·∫øt ch√≠nh c√≥ ƒëi·ªÉm nh·∫•n.
‚úÖ Hi·ªáu ·ª©ng sinh ƒë·ªông: Hover ph√≥ng to, b√≥ng ƒë·ªï nh·∫π gi√∫p tƒÉng s·ª± chuy√™n nghi·ªáp.
‚úÖ T∆∞∆°ng th√≠ch t·ªët v·ªõi m·ªçi m√†n h√¨nh: Flexbox gi√∫p c√°c b√†i vi·∫øt ph·ª• cƒÉn ch·ªânh ƒë·∫πp tr√™n m·ªçi thi·∫øt b·ªã.

    margin: auto;

üî• TUY·ªÜT CHI√äU: TH√äM HI·ªÜU ·ª®NG ANIMATION

üìå CODE BLOG N·ªîI B·∫¨T

üìù HTML:

<section id="blog" class="blog-section">
    <div class="container">
        <h2 class="blog-title">Kh√°m Ph√° Ki·∫øn Th·ª©c M·ªõi</h2>

        <!-- D√≤ng 1: Card 1 l·ªõn + Card 2 & 3 nh·ªè -->
        <div class="blog-row">

                <img src="img/project/blog/highlight.jpg" alt="B√†i vi·∫øt n·ªïi b·∫≠t">
                <div class="blog-content">

üé® CSS:

D∆∞·ªõi ƒë√¢y l√† b√†i vi·∫øt cho blog n·ªïi b·∫≠t v·ªÅ ch·ªß ƒë·ªÅ "B√≠ Quy·∫øt Thi·∫øt K·∫ø Kh√¥ng Gian ƒê·∫≥ng C·∫•p".

B√≠ Quy·∫øt Thi·∫øt K·∫ø Kh√¥ng Gian ƒê·∫≥ng C·∫•p

1. Gi·ªõi thi·ªáu

Trong th·∫ø gi·ªõi hi·ªán ƒë·∫°i, thi·∫øt k·∫ø n·ªôi th·∫•t kh√¥ng ch·ªâ d·ª´ng l·∫°i ·ªü vi·ªác b·ªë tr√≠ kh√¥ng gian m√† c√≤n th·ªÉ hi·ªán phong c√°ch, ƒë·∫≥ng c·∫•p v√† c√° t√≠nh ri√™ng c·ªßa gia ch·ªß. M·ªôt kh√¥ng gian ƒë·∫≥ng c·∫•p kh√¥ng ch·ªâ ƒë·∫πp m·∫Øt m√† c√≤n mang ƒë·∫øn s·ª± ti·ªán nghi, sang tr·ªçng v√† h√†i h√≤a. H√£y c√πng kh√°m ph√° nh·ªØng b√≠ quy·∫øt gi√∫p b·∫°n t·∫°o n√™n m·ªôt kh√¥ng gian s·ªëng ƒë·∫≥ng c·∫•p.

2. Ch·ªçn l·ª±a phong c√°ch thi·∫øt k·∫ø ph√π h·ª£p

M·ªói phong c√°ch thi·∫øt k·∫ø ƒë·ªÅu mang l·∫°i m·ªôt c·∫£m nh·∫≠n ri√™ng bi·ªát. T√πy v√†o s·ªü th√≠ch v√† m·ª•c ƒë√≠ch s·ª≠ d·ª•ng, b·∫°n c√≥ th·ªÉ l·ª±a ch·ªçn phong c√°ch ph√π h·ª£p:

  • Phong c√°ch hi·ªán ƒë·∫°i: ƒê·ªÅ cao s·ª± t·ªëi gi·∫£n, ƒë∆∞·ªùng n√©t s·∫Øc s·∫£o, gam m√†u trung t√≠nh.
  • Phong c√°ch c·ªï ƒëi·ªÉn: Ch√∫ tr·ªçng s·ª± c·∫ßu k·ª≥, tinh t·∫ø v·ªõi nh·ªØng chi ti·∫øt hoa vƒÉn t·ªâ m·ªâ.
  • Phong c√°ch t·ªëi gi·∫£n (Minimalism): √çt nh∆∞ng ch·∫•t, t·∫≠p trung v√†o c√¥ng nƒÉng v√† gi·∫£m thi·ªÉu chi ti·∫øt r∆∞·ªùm r√†.
  • Phong c√°ch Indochine: K·∫øt h·ª£p h√†i h√≤a gi·ªØa n√©t √Å ƒê√¥ng v√† s·ª± tinh t·∫ø c·ªßa ki·∫øn tr√∫c Ph√°p.

Vi·ªác l·ª±a ch·ªçn phong c√°ch s·∫Ω gi√∫p ƒë·ªãnh h√¨nh t·ªïng th·ªÉ kh√¥ng gian, t·∫°o n√™n s·ª± th·ªëng nh·∫•t trong thi·∫øt k·∫ø.

3. Ch·∫•t li·ªáu v√† m√†u s·∫Øc - Y·∫øu t·ªë quan tr·ªçng t·∫°o ƒë·∫≥ng c·∫•p

Ch·∫•t li·ªáu cao c·∫•p

Nh·ªØng ch·∫•t li·ªáu cao c·∫•p nh∆∞ g·ªó t·ª± nhi√™n, ƒë√° c·∫©m th·∫°ch, kim lo·∫°i m·∫° v√†ng, k√≠nh c∆∞·ªùng l·ª±c lu√¥n l√† l·ª±a ch·ªçn h√†ng ƒë·∫ßu ƒë·ªÉ t·∫°o n√™n s·ª± sang tr·ªçng. Ch√∫ng kh√¥ng ch·ªâ c√≥ t√≠nh th·∫©m m·ªπ cao m√† c√≤n b·ªÅn v·ªØng theo th·ªùi gian.

B·∫£ng m√†u tinh t·∫ø

M√†u s·∫Øc ƒë√≥ng vai tr√≤ quan tr·ªçng trong vi·ªác t·∫°o c·∫£m gi√°c kh√¥ng gian:

  • Gam m√†u trung t√≠nh (tr·∫Øng, be, x√°m, n√¢u nh·∫°t) mang l·∫°i s·ª± thanh l·ªãch, hi·ªán ƒë·∫°i.
  • M√†u ƒëen ho·∫∑c xanh ƒë·∫≠m gi√∫p t·∫°o ƒëi·ªÉm nh·∫•n sang tr·ªçng, quy·ªÅn l·ª±c.
  • T√¥ng m√†u pastel (h·ªìng nh·∫°t, xanh mint) t·∫°o s·ª± nh·∫π nh√†ng, thanh tho√°t.

S·ª± k·∫øt h·ª£p h√†i h√≤a gi·ªØa ch·∫•t li·ªáu v√† m√†u s·∫Øc s·∫Ω gi√∫p kh√¥ng gian tr·ªü n√™n tinh t·∫ø v√† ƒë·∫≥ng c·∫•p h∆°n.

4. √Ånh s√°ng ‚Äì B√≠ quy·∫øt t·∫°o chi·ªÅu s√¢u v√† c·∫£m x√∫c

√Ånh s√°ng l√† y·∫øu t·ªë quy·∫øt ƒë·ªãnh ƒë·∫øn kh√¥ng gian s·ªëng. M·ªôt h·ªá th·ªëng √°nh s√°ng ƒë∆∞·ª£c b·ªë tr√≠ h·ª£p l√Ω s·∫Ω gi√∫p l√†m n·ªïi b·∫≠t ƒë∆∞·ªùng n√©t ki·∫øn tr√∫c v√† t·∫°o n√™n b·∫ßu kh√¥ng kh√≠ ·∫•m c√∫ng.

C√°ch b·ªë tr√≠ √°nh s√°ng hi·ªáu qu·∫£

  • √Ånh s√°ng t·ª± nhi√™n: S·ª≠ d·ª•ng c·ª≠a k√≠nh l·ªõn, r√®m c·ª≠a m·ªèng ƒë·ªÉ t·∫≠n d·ª•ng √°nh s√°ng m·∫∑t tr·ªùi.
  • √Ånh s√°ng nh√¢n t·∫°o: K·∫øt h·ª£p √°nh s√°ng ch√≠nh (ƒë√®n tr·∫ßn) v√† √°nh s√°ng ph·ª• (ƒë√®n b√†n, ƒë√®n h·∫Øt tr·∫ßn) ƒë·ªÉ t·∫°o ƒëi·ªÉm nh·∫•n.
  • ƒê√®n ch√πm pha l√™: L√† l·ª±a ch·ªçn l√Ω t∆∞·ªüng cho kh√¥ng gian ph√≤ng kh√°ch ho·∫∑c ph√≤ng ƒÉn, mang ƒë·∫øn v·∫ª ƒë·∫πp l·ªông l·∫´y.

Vi·ªác t·∫≠n d·ª•ng √°nh s√°ng h·ª£p l√Ω kh√¥ng ch·ªâ gi√∫p kh√¥ng gian r·ªông r√£i h∆°n m√† c√≤n tƒÉng th√™m v·∫ª ƒë·∫πp sang tr·ªçng.

5. N·ªôi th·∫•t th√¥ng minh ‚Äì Xu h∆∞·ªõng t·∫•t y·∫øu

M·ªôt kh√¥ng gian ƒë·∫≥ng c·∫•p kh√¥ng th·ªÉ thi·∫øu nh·ªØng m√≥n ƒë·ªì n·ªôi th·∫•t th√¥ng minh, gi√∫p t·ªëi ∆∞u c√¥ng nƒÉng s·ª≠ d·ª•ng.

  • Sofa ƒëa nƒÉng: C√≥ th·ªÉ ƒëi·ªÅu ch·ªânh linh ho·∫°t gi·ªØa ch·∫ø ƒë·ªô ng·ªìi v√† gi∆∞·ªùng n·∫±m.
  • B√†n ƒÉn m·ªü r·ªông: Ph√π h·ª£p cho kh√¥ng gian nh·ªè, c√≥ th·ªÉ k√©o d√†i khi c·∫ßn thi·∫øt.
  • T·ªß √¢m t∆∞·ªùng: Gi√∫p ti·∫øt ki·ªám kh√¥ng gian, t·∫°o s·ª± g·ªçn g√†ng.

Ngo√†i ra, ·ª©ng d·ª•ng c√¥ng ngh·ªá th√¥ng minh nh∆∞ h·ªá th·ªëng ƒëi·ªÅu khi·ªÉn b·∫±ng gi·ªçng n√≥i, c·∫£m bi·∫øn √°nh s√°ng t·ª± ƒë·ªông, r√®m c·ª≠a ƒëi·ªán t·ª≠ c≈©ng l√† nh·ªØng y·∫øu t·ªë g√≥p ph·∫ßn n√¢ng cao tr·∫£i nghi·ªám s·ªëng ƒë·∫≥ng c·∫•p.

6. Trang tr√≠ ngh·ªá thu·∫≠t ‚Äì ƒêi·ªÉm nh·∫•n tinh t·∫ø

M·ªôt kh√¥ng gian ƒë·∫≥ng c·∫•p kh√¥ng th·ªÉ thi·∫øu ƒëi c√°c y·∫øu t·ªë ngh·ªá thu·∫≠t:

  • Tranh treo t∆∞·ªùng: Tranh tr·ª´u t∆∞·ª£ng, tranh phong c·∫£nh ho·∫∑c tranh s∆°n d·∫ßu t·∫°o ƒëi·ªÉm nh·∫•n sang tr·ªçng.
  • T∆∞·ª£ng decor: Nh·ªØng b·ª©c t∆∞·ª£ng nh·ªè b·∫±ng kim lo·∫°i ho·∫∑c ƒë√° mang l·∫°i n√©t c√° t√≠nh ri√™ng.
  • G∆∞∆°ng trang tr√≠: Kh√¥ng ch·ªâ gi√∫p m·ªü r·ªông kh√¥ng gian m√† c√≤n l√† y·∫øu t·ªë decor ·∫•n t∆∞·ª£ng.

S·ª± ph·ªëi h·ª£p tinh t·∫ø gi·ªØa ngh·ªá thu·∫≠t v√† n·ªôi th·∫•t s·∫Ω t·∫°o ra kh√¥ng gian v·ª´a ƒë·∫πp m·∫Øt v·ª´a th·ªÉ hi·ªán gu th·∫©m m·ªπ ri√™ng bi·ªát.

7. K·∫øt lu·∫≠n

File CSS (blog-highlight.css)

css
body {
    font-family: Arial, sans-serif;
    margin: 0;
    padding: 0;
    background-color: #f8f8f8;
}

.blog-header {
    background-color: #556b2f;
    color: white;
    text-align: center;
    padding: 20px;
}

.blog-content {
    width: 80%;
    max-width: 800px;
    margin: 20px auto;
    padding: 20px;
    background: white;
    border-radius: 5px;
    box-shadow: 0 0 10px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
}

h1, h2 {
    color: #333;
}

ul {
    padding-left: 20px;
}

article {
    margin-bottom: 20px;
    padding-bottom: 10px;
    border-bottom: 1px solid #ddd;
}

article:last-child {
    border-bottom: none;
}

üí° T√≥m t·∫Øt:
